story:
Badvo Distillery- Pitlochry's Gin

I'm building a gin distillery on my family farm outside Pitlochry, Perthshire. My family has farmed here for over four hundred years and over that time, we have faced a lot of change. When I came back from University I looked at one of the disused farm buildings and I thought, what potential, and decided it would be perfect for a distillery. With crowdfunding, we will be able to buy equipment for the distillery and bring you a new and exciting gin!

Why here?

Badvo is situated in Pitlochry, with two (soon to be three) other distilleries. With the edition of Badvo, the public will be able to visit Pitlochry to look at a cross-section of distilleries, ranging from the traditional to the commercial, to the modern and micro. Pitlochry will soon be a hub for those wishing to learn more about the spirits industry and get a really hands on and personal experience.



What will the crowdfunding do?
The £50,000 crowdfunding will be spent on two copper pot stills, bottling equipment, and set-up costs. If you would like to contribute you'll be open to all sorts of perks, starting at a £50 local package for an investor's edition bottle of Badvo and a trip for coffee with us at the distillery.

What makes us unique?
  • The distillery will function as diversification within our working hill farm.
  • Distilling Badvo will be done by our mother-daughter dream team.
  • We will be foraging for our botanicals from the farm so our gin will be a reflection of the land that surrounds us.
  • We are a very hands-on team and we do as much as we can ourselves, including branding, publicity, and bottling.


What's in the future?

In the following years, we have plans for expanding into the remaining farm buildings to create a tasting and coffee bar. The dream is that you'll be able to relax at the bar with a Badvo watching the distillation.


If you would like to help us out please share our page and if you have any questions please feel free to get in touch!

NB. If you would like to donate more than £500 please get in touch for tailored perks. 

More information at: http://www.badvo.com
story_txt:
Badvo Distillery- Pitlochry's Gin I'm building a gin distillery on my family farm outside Pitlochry, Perthshire. My family has farmed here for over four hundred years and over that time, we have faced a lot of change. When I came back from University I looked at one of the disused farm buildings and I thought, what potential, and decided it would be perfect for a distillery. With crowdfunding, we will be able to buy equipment for the distillery and bring you a new and exciting gin!

story:
So What Had Happened Was...

Hi everyone. A few of you great people have been asking about this campaign, why it is happening, and how the funds are going to be used. 
I first spoke with Angeli's former owner over two years ago, about purchasing the restaurant. We discussed details and issues that eventually became our contract. Three months ago, when I came to take the place over, I walked into a disaster. The damages alone took all of my startup capital. And then there was the need to replace stock and liquor that was supposed to be left for me but was not. The plumbing was shot. And the place had suffered a horrible reputation, due to the inadequate and neglectful management, cutting corners with the menu, and unprofessional mistreatment of customers. It has been an uphill battle to say the least. Added to that, was the hacking of Angeli's business acct, to the tune of $15,000. That money, I will never see again. 
So here we are. I am daily faced with the struggle to buy quality food supplies or pay my staff or my bills. Repairs are getting done, but at the cost of much needed advertisement.. a must in order to increase business. I have restaffed the restaurant with amazing people, and brought our menu back up to the high quality Angeli standard of yore. 
Now I just need to pay for it all :)

I would like to thank all of you, from the bottom of my heart, for your well wishes and your kind donations. 


See you at Angeli!


Love, Cherry

story:
Measured Irrigation Revolution

Abut 10 years ago, Bernard Omodei invented a revolutionary irrigation paradigm called measured irrigation. Measured irrigation is controlled by the weather, not by a program. It is sensitive to rainfall, temperature, humidity and wind. For measured irrigation, the application rate for each plant is directly proportional to the net evaporation rate. 

As the cost of mains water and electricity continues to rise, sustainable irrigation will need to be to be low cost, gravity feed and very efficient. Smallholders in developing countries need measured irrigation to maximise food production as their water supply dwindles due to climate change.

I have been invited to Kenya in September to test measured irrigation at some of the 60 demonstration farms being established by World Agroforestry Centre, World Food Progarm and World Vision. The Billion Dollar Business Alliance is a huge multi-agency initiative to make farm ponds and irrigation available to millions of landholders in the drylands of Africa. If you share my vision for measured irrigation, please share this campaign with your friends.

story:
Short Summary

Hi everyone!  We (Steve Crane and Dan Dandino) have heard from community members how much you all feel the void left by the closing of Highland Place/Crane’s. And, we have really missed the opportunity to feed you all! As residents of Maplewood, we know our community is underserved in foodservice and there is no place like the old Crane’s. But, that is about to change! You have the opportunity to help us get Crane’s back up and running better than ever. We are working to bring Crane’s back to the community where we will be serving all the classics you loved PLUS new offerings such as:

  • Healthy, affordable and delicious family-style dinner dinners delivered to your home
  • BYOB dine-in at our location on the weekends.
  • Saturday and Sunday brunch dine-in and delivered.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking to raise 20K but it will obviously take more than that so please support us all that you can (and spread the word)!

Based on your contribution, you will receive all kinds of goodies from a t-shirt, to a choice of a monthly gift cards good for a Dinner Delivered, Cheese Platters or $40.00 purchases in store from 1 to 10 months.

Go even bigger and we’ll include the same as above plus a special chef’s tasting dinner for 4 or 8 or we’ll close the restaurant for a private party for 20!

The Impact

Your support large or small will give our community more and better food options:

We are committed to providing family-friendly dining and delivery alternatives!

We will be brining brunch to the community with both dine-in and delivery options!

We will be creating a fun and unique BYOB dining option that captures all the greatness of the old Crane’s with new and exciting twists!

Risks & Challenges

We think we have this pretty much in the bag. Your help will allow us to do it bigger and better!

Steve and Dan are committed to making this happen - whatever it takes!

By offering high quality food and service, we are confident that the surrounding community will support us beyond what we need to flourish. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute that doesn't mean you can't help:

Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!

Share as much as you can on Facebook or Instagram!

Thank you in advance for all your support in this effort.  We look forward to serving this community for years to come and bringing smiles and satisfaction to our old friends and new!

story:
We are creating a new restaurant to change the way people eat.


Welcome to Sobremesa, this "untranslatable" concept which basically means: 

The "space" that a meal creates to allow the magic of the relationship experience between individuals

_____________________________

It's all about the FOOD !

Why does food have to be so complicated ???  And why so expensive???

It doesn't have to be, actually.  Food was never complicated -- somehow, we have made it complicated...........and expensive.

Food is basic. 

Food should be fresh. 

Food should be what is available at the time.

Food should look, feel and taste crispy and lovely.

Food should be green.

Food should have texture.

Food should transcend cultures.

_____________________________

It's all about the FLAVOR !

Spices, sauces, marinades, time (lots of time), infusions, mixtures, adobo (my favorite) and a lot of love. Combine this with the freshest of ingredients (which means whatever is available at the time, not what is cool at the time). 
That is how you do it. 
People need to eat 3 times a day, and they need to eat every day. And they need to stay healthy, and they need to save money. 

I am on a mission to change the way people eat when they eat out. 

Hello, I'm Chef Giovanna Huyke.   A huge welcome to those who know me, and those who are about to. I was born and raised in Puerto Rico, but I am a woman of the world. I have been cooking for 30+ years.  I love to cook and to enjoy a good conversation, especially at meal time. 

All my life I have been surrounded by great aroma and flavors from my mother’s kitchen... my parents had such zest for life!  It taught me to enjoy and savor life one delicious bite at a time.  I followed that creed and here I am.

I am on a mission to feed people better.  Better food.  Better flavors.  More diversity of dishes.  Better freshness.  Better health.  Better fresh.

Cooking is my passion, my heart, my life.  For sure I am no spring chicken, but I am a tough woman and I am determined to share my love for food and make an impact on life with anybody who enters my home (opps, I mean my restaurant), I want to start a conversation and food is my best language. 

____________________________

It SHOULD NOT BE all about the PRICE !

And it's not going to be more expensive.  In fact, it's going to be more affordable than anything comparable.
Eating well was never something that cost a lot of money.  Eating well was never something that should be exclusive.  Eating well is something that should be basic, and should be part of the fabric of how we live day-to-day.  Eating Well equals being healthy, mentally, physically, and spiritually.
____________________________

WHY should you care ?

My adviser calls me Gio 2.0 because I really am truly trying to revolutionize how we eat, what we eat, how we stay healthy and what we paid for it.

And it has only taken me over 30 years of cooking, traveling, learning, building a family, getting a divorce and falling pretty hard, humbling myself to a new generation of young creative chefs.  

I was so lucky to have been part of the transformation of Puerto Rican cuisine, blending the use of local ingredients with traditional cooking methods.  I was trained in a classic traditional kitchen but I was born with the sofrito in my nose (Sofrito is a savory mixture of onions garlic peppers and cilantro and the mainstay on every dish in our Island).

I have an adventurous hand and a traveling mind.  I took my Island cuisine to Spain, Japan, Costa Rica, Colombia, Greece and Hawaii.  Every place gave me a new frame of flavors. 

I spent my 20's in New Orleans where in Lee Barnes Cooking school and my first boss Paul Prudhomme taught me discipline and organization.  I lost my fear in New York with Felipe Rojas Lombardi where I learned to use my roots in everything I cooked.

I found my mentors in Puerto Rico:  Augusto Schreiner taught me strength and dedication.  And Alfredo Ayala  unlocked my taste buds and taught me  freedom of spirit when you cook.

But it was my Mother who made sense of everything I learned.  It is Mom who I still call on to discuss  menus and recipes 

I am here to ask you to be part of a wonderful opportunity that I have to share my concept of food, life and love with you.

____________________________

The Restaurant - Specifics 

We have a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

We are taking over an existing restaurant space, with a immaculate equipment and fully furnished otherwise.  This includes all operational and liquor licences.

I am calling my new restaurant Sobremesa.  Which means the content conversation after a great meal.  We want to cook your great meal!

I need to raise  $350,000.  100% of the funds will be used 

  1. to purchase initial food inventory; 
  2. to purchase the kitchen and dining equipment; 
  3. to fund the liquor and operating licenses; 
  4. to fund Initial rent payments; and
  5. to fund all other initial working capital needs.

The space is located in a vibrant, thriving, walking area of downtown Washington, DC.  I am so lucky that the existing owner has run an exceptional operation... another woman chef-owner for more than 10 years.

The space is small enough to represent my heart and the soul of the food: warm, energetic and cozy.

It is a place one can relax, meet friends, laugh, tell stories, console a friend, unwind with a drink, have coffee, and enjoy an aperitif-- just feel at home. 

This is a chef-oriented restaurant....A kitchen with no geographical boundary, where the menu is written the day the ingredients arrive.  We will use what is fresh, local and available  We will recreate flavors that come from tradition and a little of old-world vision, but in a new-world way.

I will  serve what I  love to cook, I want different cuisines mingling  on the plate frequently and promiscuously; delicious food with local ingredients from a whimsical kitchen.

We will emphasize and predominantly serve only what we make so in house breads, sausages, pastas, hot sauces, flavored oils and spiced liquors marmalade and candies.

 We will have a small menu with limited number of appetizers, main courses and desserts. Menu will always be changing based on availability, freshness and seasonal produce, and a need to try new ideas.

Our priority will be good service.  It will be fast, personal and knowledgeable, not stuffy. Diners will be the priority, where you feel you can always speak directly with the kitchen because we will cater to you.

We will have a complete bar with a variety of drinks but with a simple variety of the most important liquors and with a focus on speed and simplicity. We will make our own various selection of hand crafted specialties (but they will not cost any more--no paying an arm an a leg just because it is a new mixture)

A small but carefully picked selection of wines with chef recommendations for the dishes on the menu. Will always have a feature wine for those adventurers to try. Wine to us is a normal part of each meal we will price wines accordingly.

I have an incredible team!

I will oversee a team of hand-selected staff, experienced operational professionals in the kitchen, bar and wait staff areas, many of whom have worked with me  in the past. The intent is to maintain a small, but busy and positive staff.  We intend to target very low turnover, preferring to have a few dedicated and busy workers, rather than a larger staff which suffers from frequent turnover. 

The décor will be warm and simple so the food, the wine and the meal are main focus. The wonderful smells from the kitchen and warm homemade bread will permeate the environment.

_____________________________

The Restaurant - Overall Concept

Our essential task is to make great tasting food with great service and interesting menus. Establish a strong identity with our food and service. Develop a sense of community with our patrons. Our communication and programs will be directed towards the persons who love and enjoy a flavorful, interesting, fun and tasty food. We will feature different tastings and theme menus, invited chefs to always keep the conversation going. Word of mouth, email bank and social media will spread the word out and build our customer base.

Our pricing strategy is intended to be competitively lower than the average DC area, and lower than the price/quality equitation to which DC eaters have become accustomed.

Our Goal is to be full, 100% of the time, not partially full, part of the time and charge higher prices for such lack of volume.

I believe that the entire experience of eating, drinking and being with friends or colleagues is enhanced when there is community. Sobremesa is not intended to “break the bank” of eaters once, but rather to fairly fill the restaurant regularly, and with regulars.

Guest appearances of various food, wine and culinary hand-made food product makers will be a regular mainstay.  I intend s to involve my culinary friends, other chefs of all cultures, to experiment and share their culinary intellectual capital with diners.

This is where not being a spring chicken is a great thing.  I have had the opportunity to meet some of the masters of food, as well as work with some of the incredible new emerging talent, and I intend to give them both a showcase to create the collective environment of celebration I intend to build.

Washington DC's stature as the center of the political, diplomatic and non-governmental activity creates a constant renewal of people, ideas, and excitement. Many are looking for a regular place to dine, and the targeted restaurant’s location is located squarely in the middle of one of DC’s most vibrant, high-density neighborhoods. 

The whimsical chef-oriented and market-based cuisine, unique concept and attractive price point will differentiate us from the many, existing “upscale modern” restaurants in the DC area.

We prepared some interesting packages for your participation.  Come and be part of Sobremesa and lets keep the conversation going.

_____________________________

Some Sample Menu Items

Appetizers

White Velvet

Slowly cooked garbanzo beans transformed into a velvety cream soup with crispy chorizo crumbles

Octopus Escape

Grilled thin cut octopus salad with onions in passion fruit vinaigrette served on Malanga root fritter and seasoned

with sweet and spicy pepper marmalade aioli

Scandinavia in DC

House cured salmon with spices and dry chilies served with carrot mustard and yogurt lime and dill cheese

Ocean , Forest and Valley

Seared scallops on auburn-toasted sweet potato crumbles and mushroom ceviche

(lime and cilantro cured thinly sliced fresh mushrooms)

East meets West

Naan bread taco with grilled marinated skirt steak sliced and served with avocado butter and house kimchi

(house fermented slaw with chilies and spices)

Plantain latkes

 shredded plantain pancake seasoned with fresh horseradish served with house smoked trout,  lime mayonnaise and cabbage relish

Cruncy Puffs

Manchego and Serrano ham tatters with red pepper aioli

Creamy and Crispies

Creamy and crispy egg croquettes with green herb and arugula creamy sauce  (mom’s recipe)

Quail

Pan sautéed Quail on crispy Goat cheese polenta with red grape and molasses sauce

Crab on the Land

Crab and Malanga cakes with spicy red escabeche onions.  A vinaigrette infused onions with aji  mirasol (Peruvian dry pepper)

Pig in the Ocean

Pork belly rice cake with salted cod fish salad with green olives and capers in a lime cilantro oil vinaigrette

Ireland meets Italy

Lamb and quail scotch eggs (cooked quail egg covered with seasoned lamb breaded and fried) served with a

mint seasoned tomato aioli

Sloppy Joe

Our version of Sloppy Joes with slow braised beef brisket . served on our own bread and melted cheddar cheese. (2 sliders size)

Sloppy Jane

Sloppy Jane’s  Caribbean shrimp Jambalaya on our homemade bread served with fennel slaw 

Salads

Ear Your Greens

Boston lettuce and arugula with green beans and scallions. Mustard vinaigrette

Sautéed Chicken And Quinoa Warm Salad

Stir fried chicken, quinoa, fresh seasonal vegetables, seasoned with soy and mirin. Served with scallions, cabbage and sprout s and cranberry slaw

Fire Roasted Vegetables

Roasted vegetable salad on greens with  a classic vinaigrette seasoned with fresh basil and oregano and feta cheese crumbles 

Main Dishes

10 Layers of Heaven

Slow roasted eggplant, red peppers and leek vegetable lasagna with fresh tomato sauce and local goat cheese (Vegan)

Smokey Gambas

Citrus smoked turmeric seasoned shrimps on Parsnip puree with aromatic lime and coconut sauce

King of the Ocean

Pan fried fresh Snapper with roasted pumpkin on a white bean and longaniza from the mountains of Puerto Rico, slow roasted stew

Spain meets Asia

Pan fried cod fish served on a cilantro, lime basil, leek and rice noodle sauté with fish sauce and crispy plantain

Gio’s Pillows

House-made Duck confit and goat cheese ravioli with fire roasted pepper and tomato sauce

Chicken Fricasse

A slow cooked chicken with tomatoes, peppers, wine, green olives and capers served with white rice and avocado.

Texas Treat, Gio Style

Grilled tender skirt steak with chunky encurtido (vinegar and lime cured onions, peppers, cilantro and parsley, laced with extra virgin olive oil, served with stir fried bacon onion rice and roasted tomato

Rib Eye, Three Ways with Onions, French Fries

Grilled Rib Eye served with three ways Onions (dark marmalade, sweet with a little sour and crispy fried)

and French fries

Mojito Mahi Mahi

Pan fried Mahi Mahi with Island Mojito (a mixture of onions, peppers , olives, capers and garlic slowly cooked with fresh roasted tomato sauce with a touch of vinegar and finished with coconut milk)  Served with mashed plantains.

The Duck of LIfe

Duck Breast dry rubbed with aji panca (Peruvian dry pepper) and lime sauce on wheat berry and rice risotto, roasted carrots and radish slaw

The Rock

Grilled rock fish with green ginger broth, roasted pumpkin and scallion relish.

Slow Cooked Brazillian Black Bean Stew

Black bean stew with our house-made sausage, pork short ribs and beef tongue, yucca crumble and cilantro rice

Crusty rice dome stuffed with spinach and savory tomato base lamb stew, green tomato salad

Gio’s Sartu

Crusty rice dome stuffed with spinach and savory tomato base lamb stew, green tomato salad

Fall-off-the-bone Smokey Rosemary Lamb Shank

Slow-braised Lamb shank seasoned with rosemary, parsley and thyme on its own juices served on white bean puree

Oxtail Bourguinnonne

Oxtail ragu with sweet potatoe gnochis

Mardi Gras in DC

New Orleans flavored shrimps on Quinoa porridge and Garlic chips.

Sides

10 Layers of Heaven

Slow roasted eggplant, red peppers and leek vegetable lasagna with fresh tomato sauce and local goat cheese (Vegan)

Bacon And Onion Rice

Bacon and onion rice medium grain rice cooked with dark onion broth seasoned with bacon and  parsley

French Fries

French fries fresh made the traditional way

Root Vegetable Puree

Root vegetable puree  Seasonal root vegetable seasoned with roasted garlic and mashed with butter and extra virgin olive oil

Roasted Tomatoes

Roasted tomatoes:  Herb seasoned ripe on the vine local tomatoes, topped with a thin layer of bread crumbs and parmesan cheese roasted to perfection

White Rice

White rice  Medium grain rice simply made so you can enjoy sauces better.  (my father always had rice because he said it was the best way to enjoy everything till the last bite)

Seasonal Vegetables

Lightly Sautéed With Butter Or Olive Oil  (Pick One Or A Combination)


Desserts

Blueberry Delight

Best of the crop juicy blueberries slowly roasted on a buttery crust and served with refreshing ginger ice cream

Caramel Obsession

Vanilla custard and caramel ice cream crispy burnt sugar cookies and best caramel sauce ice cream, cookies and caramel sauce

Chocolate Decadence

Flourless cake with Nutella ice-cream and berry coulis

Bananas and Rum

Fresh warm banana dumplings served on a buttery rum caramel sauce

Amalfi Coast Tart

Lemon curd tart with meringue fresh lime and lemon curd on butter and nut crust with velvety toasted Italian meringue

Coffee and Chocolates

Espresso ice cream with chocolate truffles  Better and cooler than the plain espresso

Italy versus France

Guava and Frangipane (almond paste) pie served warm with whipped cream

A mixture of gooey warm guava paste with  almond and rum topping and fresh whipped cream

Sweet Dance

Sweet corn-meal cake with fresh fruit compote a pound cake with the corn undertones, dancing underneath fresh seasonal fruit

Eating well was never something that cost a lot of money.  Eating well was never something that should be exclusive.  Eating well is something that should be basic, and should be part of the fabric of how we live day-to-day.  Eating Well equals being healthy, mentally, physically, and spiritually.

____________________________



WHY should you care ?
My adviser calls me Gio 2.0 because I really am truly trying to revolutionize how we eat, what we eat, how we stay healthy and what we paid for it.
And it has only taken me over 30 years of cooking, traveling, learning, building a family, getting a divorce and falling pretty hard, humbling myself to a new generation of young creative chefs.  

I was so lucky to have been part of the transformation of Puerto Rican cuisine, blending the use of local ingredients with traditional cooking methods.  I was trained in a classic traditional kitchen but I was born with the sofrito in my nose (Sofrito is a savory mixture of onions garlic peppers and cilantro and the mainstay on every dish in our Island).
I have an adventurous hand and a traveling mind.  I took my Island cuisine to Spain, Japan, Costa Rica, Colombia, Greece and Hawaii.  Every place gave me a new frame of flavors. 
I spent my 20's in New Orleans where in Lee Barnes Cooking school and my first boss Paul Prudhomme taught me discipline and organization.  I lost my fear in New York with Felipe Rojas Lombardi where I learned to use my roots in everything I cooked.
I found my mentors in Puerto Rico:  Augusto Schreiner taught me strength and dedication.  And Alfredo Ayala  unlocked my taste buds and taught me  freedom of spirit when you cook.
But it was my Mother who made sense of everything I learned.  It is Mom who I still call on to discuss  menus and recipes 
I am here to ask you to be part of a wonderful opportunity that I have to share my concept of food, life and love with you.
____________________________

The Restaurant - Specifics 

We have a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
We are taking over an existing restaurant space, with a immaculate equipment and fully furnished otherwise.  This includes all operational and liquor licences.
I am calling my new restaurant Sobremesa.  Which means the content conversation after a great meal.  We want to cook your great meal!
I need to raise  $350,000.  100% of the funds will be used 


to purchase initial food inventory; 
to purchase the kitchen and dining equipment; 
to fund the liquor and operating licenses; 
to fund Initial rent payments; and

to fund all other initial working capital needs.


The space is located in a vibrant, thriving, walking area of downtown Washington, DC.  I am so lucky that the existing owner has run an exceptional operation... another woman chef-owner for more than 10 years.
The space is small enough to represent my heart and the soul of the food: warm, energetic and cozy.
It is a place one can relax, meet friends, laugh, tell stories, console a friend, unwind with a drink, have coffee, and enjoy an aperitif-- just feel at home. 
This is a chef-oriented restaurant....A kitchen with no geographical boundary, where the menu is written the day the ingredients arrive.  We will use what is fresh, local and available  We will recreate flavors that come from tradition and a little of old-world vision, but in a new-world way.

I will  serve what I  love to cook, I want different cuisines mingling  on the plate frequently and promiscuously; delicious food with local ingredients from a whimsical kitchen.
We will emphasize and predominantly serve only what we make so in house breads, sausages, pastas, hot sauces, flavored oils and spiced liquors marmalade and candies.
 We will have a small menu with limited number of appetizers, main courses and desserts. Menu will always be changing based on availability, freshness and seasonal produce, and a need to try new ideas.
Our priority will be good service.  It will be fast, personal and knowledgeable, not stuffy. Diners will be the priority, where you feel you can always speak directly with the kitchen because we will cater to you.
We will have a complete bar with a variety of drinks but with a simple variety of the most important liquors and with a focus on speed and simplicity. We will make our own various selection of hand crafted specialties (but they will not cost any more--no paying an arm an a leg just because it is a new mixture)
A small but carefully picked selection of wines with chef recommendations for the dishes on the menu. Will always have a feature wine for those adventurers to try. Wine to us is a normal part of each meal we will price wines accordingly.
I have an incredible team!
I will oversee a team of hand-selected staff, experienced operational professionals in the kitchen, bar and wait staff areas, many of whom have worked with me  in the past. The intent is to maintain a small, but busy and positive staff.  We intend to target very low turnover, preferring to have a few dedicated and busy workers, rather than a larger staff which suffers from frequent turnover. 
The décor will be warm and simple so the food, the wine and the meal are main focus. The wonderful smells from the kitchen and warm homemade bread will permeate the environment.


_____________________________


The Restaurant - Overall Concept
Our essential
task is to make great tasting food with great service and interesting menus. Establish a strong identity with
our food and service. Develop a sense of community with our patrons. Our
communication and programs will be directed towards the persons who love and
enjoy a flavorful, interesting, fun and tasty food. We will feature different
tastings and theme menus, invited chefs to always keep the conversation going.
Word of mouth, email bank and social media will spread the word out and build
our customer base.
Our pricing
strategy is intended to be competitively lower than the average DC area, and
lower than the price/quality equitation to which DC eaters have become
accustomed.
Our Goal is to be full, 100% of the time,
not partially full, part of the time and charge higher prices for such lack of
volume. 
I believe that the
entire experience of eating, drinking and being with friends or colleagues is
enhanced when there is community. Sobremesa is not intended to “break the bank”
of eaters once, but rather to fairly fill the restaurant regularly, and with
regulars.
Guest
appearances of various food, wine and culinary hand-made food product makers
will be a regular mainstay.  I intend s to involve my culinary
friends, other chefs of all cultures, to experiment and share their culinary
intellectual capital with diners. 
This is where not being a spring chicken is a great
thing.  I have had the opportunity to
meet some of the masters of food, as well as work with some of the incredible
new emerging talent, and I intend to give them both a showcase to create the
collective environment of celebration I intend to build.
Washington DC's stature as the center of the political, diplomatic and non-governmental activity creates a constant renewal of people, ideas, and excitement. Many are looking for a regular place to dine, and the targeted
restaurant’s location is located squarely in the middle of one of DC’s most
vibrant, high-density neighborhoods. 
The whimsical
chef-oriented and market-based cuisine, unique concept and attractive price
point will differentiate us from the many, existing “upscale modern”
restaurants in the DC area. 

We prepared some
interesting packages for your participation.  Come and be part
of Sobremesa and lets keep the conversation going.


_____________________________

story:
Rainbow Automotive is an automotive maintenance and repair facility. We have a passion for helping single parents to make certain that they are driving their children around in safe, secure & reliable vehicles. To this end, because we cannot help as much as we would like to, we are asking YOU to help us help them!

What We Need & What You Get

• Any funding we receive will be placed in a separate account that will then accumulate as an account to help single moms get their vehicles maintained and repaired

• We will have an application process so that we and YOU know for sure that the single mom requires a helping hand for our services; these applications will be kept strictly confidential; the applications will be assessed by the management team; the applicants will then be notified as to how much funding they qualify for

• The funds attained will be accumulated on an ongoing basis with the hope that we may lend a helping hand to several single moms and their children. • What you get in return for helping someone is a “happy contented heart” plus from Rainbow Automotive a thank you gift of $20.00 off your next service or repair done at our shop

The Impact

• How will YOU impact single parents? Your gift to these people will be received whole-heartedly by someone who truly needs this help. Many single parents have a hard time asking for a helping hand from anyone. We want them to know that they are so valuable to our community and we welcome them with open arms.

• With your help, these single parents will receive the maintenance, service & repairs they require to ensure that they and their children are safe in the vehicles being driven.

• Rainbow Automotive has done many fundraising campaigns of varying degrees and in varying ways. From barbeques to collecting bottles to having a charity car show, Rainbow Automotive has raised over $125,000 for various organizations. These include the MS Society, Ronald McDonald House Northern Charities, Cancer Society, SPCA Grande Prairie, Habitat for Humanity, and Rising Above Ministries. Risks & Challenges

We realize that YOU as a donor will question how these funds will be dispersed.

• We will have an application form that must be filled out by the single parent applying for funds to have her vehicle serviced or repaired.

• This application will then be assessed by the management team and a decision shall be made. The single parent will then be contacted and discreetly discussed with regarding the application. When deemed that the applicant would be in need of the assistance from the fundraising account, then we would withdraw funds from the account to help pay their invoice.

• We would make available to the donors the number and monetary amounts of single moms who have been aided by this fundraising campaign. No names will be released in compliance with the FOIP act.

Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean YOU can't help:

• What we ask of you is to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!

• We would like to remind YOU to use the Indiegogo share tools!

• Spread the word that Rainbow Automotive truly cares about our community and the people in it! We care about their safety on and off the road!

We strive to provide the utmost in customer service.

Our MISSION STATEMENT states the following:

At Grande Prairie Rainbow Automotive Ltd. It is our Mission To Reduce Stress, Costly Breakdowns and Save our Customers Time and Money To Accomplish this We Will:

• Book your next appointment tailored to your time schedule

• Perform inspections for safety and maintenance every time on every vehicle

• Commit to “No Surprises!” Never proceed with any maintenance or repair work without customer authorization

• Commit to “No Surprises!” Never present an invoice that was larger than the most recent current estimate

• Provide all manufacturers recommended services

• Provide new warranty inspections and on line search for all manufacturers recalls

• Provide highly skilled diagnostic technicians to accurately solve the toughest problems

• Source and provide needed parts considering quality, price and availability

• Provide and maintain responsible environmental practices • Provide a personalized and competitive warranty

• We will never sell you anything you do not need or want!

Through these principles we will continue to be a professional service provider to all our clients and their referred friends, family members and associates.

If you have any questions or want more information please call 780-539-3706 or check us out on our website @ www.rainbowautomotive.ca

story:
Hello world ^_^

My name is Adam , a young maker & this is my first real thing i made as a real project for the world ^_^
 

Today, i want to introduce you my M-DuinoCore !

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

M-DuinoCore is a tinny embedded "Arduino Mega2560 compatible" in a cute cube with a flexible design that allow anybody to use it as a surface mounted device with any simple handmade PCB .

You will not need to care about the small pins of the Atmega2560 MCU or there orientations anymore because they are all re-designed to be flexible with any idea you have in your mind & save lots of your time for another things ^_^

 
Also, uploading your arduino sketches is easy as "hello" & all what you will need is an external USB/TTL converter with a DTR function to upload your ideas inside it :D
 
In fact.. the M-DuinoCore was just an idea that i imagined & worked on it to solve my own little problems with my electronic projects & prototypes because we still dont have any professional PCB manufacturer that can make my complex dreams...

So that's way i made it ^_^ 

 

Its the same microcontroller chip in both sides to see how much M-Duinocore is easy to use when things become complex !! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
This is a little demo with M-DuinoCore that you can see in my video ... When things become complex

 

 

This is a little design on Eagle Cad with the M-DuinoCore in this pictures & as you can see it's really easy to use it & to organize your design compared to an Atmega2560 chipset ..

 

The Second picture is the M-DuinoCore itself with all his complex wiring inside the PCB cube ^_^

 

 
 

Why i'm really here (^_^) !!!

I should admit that this project taken me a lot of time & money until the first prototypes seen the light.
Unfortunately creative technologies & ideas don't grow up at my place & no one support that really ... So that's why i'm here to let this idea to meet anyone that can need it.
I'm trying the last impossible way now here after trying all the possible ways ... 
 
 
Your generous contributions will be useful to:
1- Finance & manufacture the M-DuinoCore to become cheap for anybody want to use it in his projects 
2- Unloking all the gates that still closed to me to make this project successful 
3- Developing  new & enhanced designs for the M-DuinoCore to be in the future a complete solution with various options 
 

Thanks :)

I will be thankful to anyone that can support this project ... not only with contributions , but also by your comments about it & sharing with anyone that would like to see it

If that works ... there will be more interesting things in the future ^_^

story:
Short Summary

My children are very picky eaters and will eat nothing if it's not delicious and full of flavor. For the most part, I also require the meals to be all of the above as well as nutritious. So I refined the stew, and developed other marinades and mixes over the years that have proven to be all-time winners - with my family, friends and pot-luck gathering guests. 

Gourmet Stew for Grains - Ancient grains are good for you but, they do not always taste good enough to tempt you on their own. Enter the Purely Good Foods Gourmet Stew for Grains. While it has its roots in Nigerian cuisine, this locally sourced, tomato based, long simmered sauce is so versatile, it can be used over vegetables, soups, meats, fish and poultry. 

Suyarific Grilling Sauce - Peanut butter based, and exploding with flavor, this sauce is perfect for use as a coating for beef (including organ meats) to be grilled without first marinating it. Provides a lot of moisture for your meat.

Suyarific Grilling Rub - Also peanut based, this mix is a rub that can be used the same way as the sauce. packed full of flavor, meat does not need to be marinated beforehand either.

Not Your Plain Fry Mix - Hold on to your horses when this mix is used for frying or baking poultry or seafood. Also bursting with flavor, a little of this mix goes a long way to flavoring your fish and poultry and bringing a fresh, delicious new taste to your table.

All foods described here come in Hot, Medium and Mild heats to accommodate all tastes.

  • I am Adaora Ihekwaba and I have been passionate about cooking since my first child, and subsequent four children were born with pronounced picky palates for foods. This challenged me to come up with nutritious, delicious meals they would eat. 
  • We would love to introduce these delicious sauces and mixes to the marketplace and have people discover them. While they certainly helped and are still helping me get nutrition into my children (lol...), they are not only for picky eaters. They will bring a new richness and diversity to your eating experience.  

As passionate and excited as we are about getting these foods out to the marketplace, the process is an expensive one and, as you can imagine, our start up does not have the required funds to do it without your help.

What We Need & What You Get

Ladies and Gentlemen, the bottom line is that we need to raise $10,000.00 for the following purposes:

  • Finish the schedule of process documentation for the tomato based sauces
  • Get Nutrition Facts table and Ingredient statements for all products
  • Buy containers and packaging for all products
  • Design product labels to FDA standards and printing costs
  • Conduct small-bench and scale-up testing for production
  • Hire 2 booths at large farmers markets to sell products
  • Hire two part-time employees at minimum wage
  • Rent commercial kitchen 

Our Perks

We will be offering several perks to our supporters starting with:
$5 gets you our eternal gratitude and a shout out on Facebook
$10 gets you 6 oz bag of Seafood and Poultry Fry Mix (20)
$25 gets you 8 oz bottles of Stew and Marinade with recipe cards  (40) 
$50 gets you 8 oz bottles of Stew and Marinade, 10 oz Grilling and Fry Mix with recipe cards  (22)
$75 gets you 12 oz bottles of Stew and Marinade, 16 oz Grilling and Fry Mix with recipe cards  (16)
$100 gets you a beautiful gift basket with 12 oz bottles of Stew, Marinade, 16 oz Grilling and Fry Mix with recipe cards    (40)
$250 gets you a beautiful gift basket with 12 oz bottles of Stew, Marinade, 16 oz Grilling and Fry, 3 ancient grains with recipe cards    (40)  

The Impact

Your contribution to our campaign will go a long way to helping us bring these products to the marketplace at this time. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, I understand that sometimes, temporary circumstances make it so there is just no way to contribute any money to my campaign. In that case, could you help us spread the word, please? 

  • Let your friends know about our campaign, encourage them to contribute - we have some pretty neat rewards.
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools! 
  • Hey, you can 'like' us too


Thank You for your support! We hope to see you in the marketplace soon!!
story_txt:
Short Summary My children are very picky eaters and will eat nothing if it's not delicious and full of flavor. For the most part, I also require the meals to be all of the above as well as nutritious. So I refined the stew, and developed other marinades and mixes over the years that have proven to be all-time winners - with my family, friends and pot-luck gathering guests. 
Gourmet Stew for Grains - Ancient grains are good for you but, they do not always taste good enough to tempt you on their own. Enter the Purely Good Foods Gourmet Stew for Grains. While it has its roots in Nigerian cuisine, this locally sourced, tomato based, long simmered sauce is so versatile, it can be used over vegetables, soups, meats, fish and poultry. 
Suyarific Grilling Sauce - Peanut butter based, and exploding with flavor, this sauce is perfect for use as a coating for beef (including organ meats) to be grilled without first marinating it. Provides a lot of moisture for your meat.
Suyarific Grilling Rub - Also peanut based, this mix is a rub that can be used the same way as the sauce. packed full of flavor, meat does not need to be marinated beforehand either.
Not Your Plain Fry Mix - Hold on to your horses when this mix is used for frying or baking poultry or seafood. Also bursting with flavor, a little of this mix goes a long way to flavoring your fish and poultry and bringing a fresh, delicious new taste to your table.
All foods described here come in Hot, Medium and Mild heats to accommodate all tastes.  I am Adaora Ihekwaba and I have been passionate about cooking since my first child, and subsequent four children were born with pronounced picky palates for foods. This challenged me to come up with nutritious, delicious meals they would eat.  We would love to introduce these delicious sauces and mixes to the marketplace and have people discover them. While they certainly helped and are still helping me get nutrition into my children (lol...), they are not only for picky eaters. They will bring a new richness and diversity to your eating experience.  
  As passionate and excited as we are about getting these foods out to the marketplace, the process is an expensive one and, as you can imagine, our start up does not have the required funds to do it without your help.   What We Need & What You Get Ladies and Gentlemen, the bottom line is that we need to raise $10,000.00 for the following purposes:

Finish the schedule of process documentation for the tomato based sauces
Get Nutrition Facts table and Ingredient statements for all products
Buy containers and packaging for all products
Design product labels to FDA standards and printing costs

Conduct small-bench and scale-up testing for production

Hire 2 booths at large farmers markets to sell products
Hire two part-time employees at minimum wage
Rent commercial kitchen     Our Perks
We will be offering several perks to our supporters starting with:
$5 gets you our eternal gratitude and a shout out on Facebook
$10 gets you 6 oz bag of Seafood and Poultry Fry Mix (20)
$25 gets you 8 oz bottles of Stew and Marinade with recipe cards  (40) 
$50 gets you 8 oz bottles of Stew and Marinade, 10 oz Grilling and Fry Mix with recipe cards  (22)
$75 gets you 12 oz bottles of Stew and Marinade, 16 oz Grilling and Fry Mix with recipe cards  (16)

$250 gets you a beautiful gift basket with 12 oz bottles of Stew, Marinade, 16 oz Grilling and Fry, 3 ancient grains with recipe cards    (40)  

The Impact Your contribution to our campaign will go a long way to helping us bring these products to the marketplace at this time.

In that case, could you help us spread the word, please?   Let your friends know about our campaign, encourage them to contribute - we have some pretty neat rewards. story:
Did you know there are over 250,000 serious hand, finger and wrist injuries reported every year due to box cutters, utility knives and blades?   It’s hard to believe that something so small and useful can be so dangerous.

We believe the SAFETY BLADE is the answer !!!


The original idea of the Safety Blade came from a young man that worked in an auto body shop.  After witnessing multiple injuries to his co-workers due to the unsafe storage of razor blades, he came up with an idea – he wanted to create a utility blade that could be safely stored and disposed of in the workplace.
The goal became to create the safest cutting tool on the market today.  "NEVER TOUCH THE BLADE" became the engineering slogan.

The result is a state of the art blade that is safe to carry, safe to use, safe to dispose of and safe for the environment.


Responsible Parenting
We owe it to our children to keep them safe.  This state of the art retractable blade is safe enough for classroom, home and office use.  Safety Blade is the ideal cutting tool for your family.

Reduce Workplace Injuries

Safe, durable and easy to use.  Safety Blade increases workplace safety and will reduce employee accidents and injuries on the job site.  Greatly reduces product damage.


Perfect for Do-It-Yourself Projects

Steel blade is stronger and lasts longer than the typical razor blade.  It is ideal for cutting wood, wallboard and molding.  Scrapes paint and stickers from glass and metal.


Recyclable and Eco-Friendly

Promote green living for your children and community.  Our product is safe for the environment, and it can be recycled as easily as a soda can without endangering others.









Scott J. Cooper is the CEO and Creative Director of World Patent Marketing.  He is also the Director and Founder of The Cooper Idea Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to providing funding for special causes around the world.  







If you are interested Safety Blade and World Patent Marketing but you do not want to participate in our campaign, please visit the World Patent Marketing web site or the Safety Blade web site for more information.

CLICK HERE to learn more about The Cooper Idea Foundation.

story:
Who are We?

My name is Mauro. I am a plant-based cook. Myself, my wife, daughter & dog adopted a plant-based lifestyle over 10 years ago. We are also Italian. Well, my dog is not Italian, although she thinks she is.

It took a trip to Italy in 2006 to discover the most incredible plant-based Italian food that I had ever seen. Foods that I thought were lost to me forever, since, let's face it when we say plant-based, Italy is not the first country that comes to mind. Wrooooong! I should have known that the country known the world over for the quality of its food would take plant-based Italian food to new culinary heights.

By the end of that trip I was importing these products to Canada. Years later we would open the first ever Vegan Italian Food Emporium in Toronto. All the while I continued to work on perfecting our very own handcrafted plant-based Italian foods. We have been serving these products to our catering clients for years. Now we would like to share our food with everyone who loves and appreciates great homemade authentic Italian food. 

What do we want to do?

We are The Vegitaliano - Italian Street food Deli. We take the centuries old tradition of great Italian Street food and we make the most amazing fresh, made to order Italian sandwiches with freshly baked schiacciata bread and our very own handcrafted plant-based Italian inspired cutlets, meatballs, sausages, porchetta, salumi, cheeses and much more.

           

                                          

We want to transport you to a Salumeria/Deli in Italy. The smell of freshly baked bread and simmering tomato sauce in the air. Deli cases full of our handcrafted plant-based cheeses (handmade ricotta, bocconcini, aged asiago/parmiggiano, aged goat style, provolone), meats, salumi that we utilize in our sandwiches but, that you can also buy whole. Desserts, let's not forget desserts. Handmade Tiramisu, cannoli, bombe and more. So delicious they will leave you questioning if in fact they could actually be Dairy & Egg free. 

           

           

           

           

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are excited to share with you our amazing Italian Street food. We guarantee you will not be disappointed with our offerings. 

We are looking to raise $30000 to help us grow our business to the retail level.  Start up costs for rent, equipment, permits etc are what we need to continue to grow.

             

 

If we don't reach our goal, the money will still go to start up costs, but we will just have less money and have to get more creative. 

 

GRAZIE DAL CUORE! FROM OUR HEARTS WE THANK YOU!

 

 

            

 

            

 

             

 

             

 

             

 

            

 

               

 

                 

 

                  

                 

                   

                     

                                    

 

                      

 

 

             

The Impact

Spreading the peaceful cuisine message in a positive way through great food is what we essentially do. Having a retail location will help us spread this positive message. Our goal is to create a place where everyone who loves great Italian food can experience a little slice of plant-based Italy and at the same time benefit our amazing animal brothers and sisters, our beautiful Mother Earth and our very own well being one meal at a time.  Your contribution and support will help us reach our goal.  

Risks & Challenges

Opening a retail business is risky and a food  business is even riskier, but I have been in the plant-based food business for over 10 years now and I have the loving support of my beautiful family and a knowledge of and passion for Italian Inspired plant-based foods. I've been in business long enough to know that it takes hard work and dedication to build a successful and profitable retail outlet. Heck, it's taken years of hard work, love and passion to get us this far and we are continuing to put a lot of our own sweat, time, energy, and money into making this happen. 

The challenge is finding the right space for our Deli. The more complete the location (ie: taking over a previous food space) the more we can do with less funds.

There is a risk that we will not make our goal, however. we have created perks that you can claim from our existing catering business, without having to wait for the Deli to open. 

Main Goal: $30,000.00 

Interim goals: $20,000.00 - A refrigerated Street food trailer will help us get to vegan events all over Southern Ontario/Quebec corridor. This interim goal will make this possible.

            

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't financially support this campaign please MAKE SOME NOISE about us and SHARE our link. We need your help to get more contributors. 

Help us get the word out! Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, via E-mail - whatever! Also, another invaluable way to help us get the word out is to use the Indiegogo Share Tools.

If you haven't already, the best thing that you could do for free is adopt a plant-based lifestyle or at least start your journey toward one. 

Visit our online hubs, and feel free to share them as well!

http://www.facebook.com/thevegitaliano

http://Twitter.com/BelloBio

Thank you for taking the time to read this, and we thank you in advance for anything you are able to contribute.

Grazie Mille! Thank You so much!

story:
Like many businesses these days we need to evolve in order to survive.

In order to continue, we need to merge. We are asking for your help to save two iconic LGBTQ businesses.

Two of Ottawa’s oldest LGBTQ businesses are merging to create a 2-level shopping experience.  With both businesses having a large LGBTQ customer base (49 years in business combined), it makes sense to have both businesses in one location. This merger will help us survive into the future.

After Stonewall opened June 18, 1990 as the LGBTQ’s community place for literature and magazines. It became a place to meet and discuss books and find out what is going on in the community. In 2012, the business was sold and Stonewall Gallery and Bookstore has quickly become Ottawa’s Art for Everyday Living experience.  Still maintaining Ottawa’s only LGBTQ bookstore, it also showcases Artists from Ontario and Quebec, creating glassware, pottery, jewellery, textile, fine art and sculpture. With book launches and art events, Stonewall continues to bring together the literary and art lovers. 

Wilde’s first opened in September 1993. After a couple of moves, Wilde’s settled onto Bank Street and has become the Village’s oldest adult store. The business was sold in 2015 and continues to evolve. Adult toys and accessories are more popular than ever. LGBTQ and Pride merchandise are in more demand. The space is no longer able to supply that demand.

The goal is to continue showcasing Canadian Artists works on the Stonewall main level but expand Pride merchandise, literature and cards and create an inviting Wilde’s lower level promoting adult toys and accessories, lubes, massage oils, creams, underwear and leather fashions.  Both levels will host events throughout the year including Meet the Artist evenings, book launches, book clubs, product launches, educational evenings, etc.

By merging Stonewall and Wilde’s we can create an artistic, playful and fun environment.  Stonewall Artists have already started creating handmade Pride merchandise including cups, bowls, coasters, glassware, jewellery and more in addition to their current works currently showcased at Stonewall.

Help 2 of Ottawa’s oldest LGBTQ businesses merge together into one space, becoming Ottawa’s very own one stop shopping experience.

OUR GOAL: We are looking for $12,000 to cover renovations.

We are also looking for "Angel Investors" who are interested in donating more than $2,000. Please contact Michael or Trevor for more information.

story:
Informative Articles About Interesting topics such as Cognitive Computing Robots 

COG · NI · TIVE / käg-nə-tiv (adjective): of, relating to or involving conscious mental activities (such as thinking, understanding, learning and remembering)

Our Cognitive Future and the Robotic Revolution

The Future is here, a new age of computers has arrived. Cognitive systems are able to put content into context, providing confidence-weighted responses, with supporting evidence.

These systems fundamentally change the way humans and systems interact and significantly extend the capabilities of humans by leveraging their ability to provide expert assistance and to understand. These systems provide expert assistance by developing deep domain insights and bringing this information to people in a timely, natural and usable way.

Here, cognitive systems play the role of an assistant – albeit one who is tireless, can consume vast amounts of structured and unstructured information, can reconcile ambiguous and even self-contradictory data, and can learn. In this partnership, the two – human and machine – are more effective than either one alone.

Much like the human brain, these systems begin to build models of themselves and the world around them. This world consists of the system itself, the knowledge ingested from information corpora and the users of the system. The models include the contextual relationships between various entities in a system’s world that enable it to form hypotheses and arguments.

As a result, these systems are able to engage in deep dialogue with humans.  In the future, increasingly more domain-specific question and answer (Q&A) systems are expected to emerge. Additionally, future cognitive systems will advance to have free form dialogue and reasoning capabilities.

The big question is will Cognitive Computing Robots spell Dome for the American Worker.                   

  The Rise of the Machine  

Robot Replacements may leave Millions Jobless.

Many company's such as Lowes, McDonalds, Amazon, are using robots with great success.  In the near future, you might be surprised to visit the giant hardware store in your town and find yourself greeted by a chatty robot rather than a human sales assistant.

A harbinger of this age of robotic shopping is being trialled with two Oshbot robot sales assistants at an Orchard Supply Hardware store in San Jose, California. Built by Lowe’s Innovation Labs and Silicon Valley technology company Fellow Robots using "science fiction prototyping," the OSHbots are designed to not only identify and locate merchandise, but to speak to customers in their own languages.

Lowes OSHbots Sales Assistant 

              

McDonalds Robots
                      

Amazons Robots

      

Corporations Win Big with Robots Zero Wages, Benefits etc.

          2030 Ideal Family  for Corporations

Robots That have the ability to think for themselves.

What Next?

       

                                                                                          

Riveting Articles

About amazing cool things straight out of Science Fiction such as Wearable Technology 

 

Technology is advancing rapidly and the enormous amount of information collected thru the use of the internet, cell phone, cameras and other Technology per minute  per hour in all areas of our life is staggering. This explosion of data has lead to new terms being created like Big Data and Data Exhaust.

Steve Weber a professor at the University of California School of Information's data science program states

"I'm wearing sensors, and everything I interact with is instrumented in some fashion. It starts to become mind-boggling, both in terms of what we can know, and the almost unlimited number of things we can do with that data."

That depends, of course, on whether the information is collected and analyzed, ideally by well intentioned parties.

"People sometimes use the term 'data exhaust' [to describe] all the data that their interaction with the world is throwing off, and how little of it gets collected," says Weber.

The Drawback Question Will Big Data mean a complete and total end to Privacy

   None. of your data is safe.   according to writer Jeffrey Van Camp. “None of these services (cloud storage companies) guarantee the protection of any files you upload, and there are no promises that these services won’t freely share your files and information with the government or other companies.” 

            It  Gets Worse.  

In a recent article in the Huffington Post “the CTO of the CIA, Ira "Gus" Hunt said that the world is increasingly awash in information from text messages, tweets, and videos -- and that the agency wants all of it.” Not only that, the agency wants to keep it “forever.”  Be Careful What you Post Online.

Maybe it's time to return to earlier old, old forms of communication that are more private and personal, TALKING and LETTER WRITING . 

                

   

Industrial Solutions

Global Solutions Magazine will provide listings of solutions necessary for Business in a market that's constantly changing.  Global Solutions Magazine will provide new products Developed, listed by Industry, Solution, Product name, Description and a link to Company's website for further details.  We will also list Company's with various problems for which they are seeking solutions.

 

Global Solutions Magazine is Tech -Savvy and will keep you up to date on new technological advances but  that's not all we are multi-dimensional and well balanced with fun, Entertainment and monetization. Connect your Ingenuity to Opportunity

Global Solutions Magazine allows you to upload your video or text on any topic or subject The Video can be provided free or monetized. A video advertised globally by Global Solutions Magazine can receive 100 to 1,000,000 views or more  Fueling Growth and Profitability with your Information ,Solutions, Entertainment and more making the World work Better.

Using Global Solutions Magazine pay-per-view video hosting you'll receive payments immediately to your selected online merchant account.

                              

 

Own a Business with live Entertainment Upload your Event

   

                       

Book your Bands next gig by Uploading a Preview Of your performance in the Entertainment section Of Global Solutions Magazine. Reach a Global Audience.  

 

                     

 

Global Solutions Magazine is more than just a Magazine.

Showcase and Monetize your  Personal Talent.

                                   

                        

  

                ACCEPT PAYMENTS WORLDWIDE     

            

 

Global Solution Magazine Will also provide Exciting Adventurous and Fun articles of interest in many category's including;

 

Arts and Entertainment

Apartment Rental and Real Estate

Auto SUV and Truck Review

Business Review & Directory

Camping

Entertainment

Fashion

Restaurant Review

Music

Movie and Theater Preview and Review

Personal Finance

Sports

Scouting

Retirement

Travel

World Events

And Much Much More

 

Funds Raised

Will be used to purchase software, technical assistance, advertising, graphic designers, writers, creating a great product, employment and opportunity for many.  

 

About the Founder

Greetings to all my name is Miles Cuyler a little bit about myself. I am proud to have served in both the U.S. Army Reserve and the U.S. Navy as a Hospital Corpsman I have a College Degree in Physical Therapy and strong background in Sales. I saved this short Bio for last to exemplify the concept of Global Solutions Magazine which is selfless sharing of knowledge and information. Now that does not mean to give everything away free, sharing information can be very profitable, nor does it mean to give away Top Secrets to the enemy that could jeopardize a persons well being or the products or profits of a company, but the sharing of useful information in a positive way that is beneficial to the world as a community, helping to spin things in the right direction. I personally find that I am more creative when I consider the needs of others, as in sales it always important to keep the needs of the client first and foremost. Their success means your success.  We look forward to providing these uniquely dynamic enterprising service and hope you will join The Solutions Team, take advantage of the money saving perks and support our funding effort. 

Please Share This Campaign and check out our share contest coming soon.  Win a 7 Day Get Away with share rewards.  Resort suite sleeps up to 6 people shares can be combined with up to 6 friends to achieve Goal.  You Deserve a Get Away. Good Luck.

Thanks in advance for your support.
story_txt:
Informative Articles About Interesting topics such as Cognitive Computing Robots 
COG · NI · TIVE / käg-nə-tiv (adjective): of, relating to or involving conscious mental activities (such as thinking, understanding, learning and remembering)Our Cognitive Future and the Robotic RevolutionThe Future is here, a new age of computers has arrived. Cognitive systems are able to put content into context, providing confidence-weighted responses, with supporting evidence.These systems fundamentally change the way humans and systems interact and significantly extend the capabilities of humans by leveraging their ability to provide expert assistance and to understand. These systems provide expert assistance by developing deep domain insights and bringing this information to people in a timely, natural and usable way.Here, cognitive systems play the role of an assistant – albeit one who is tireless, can consume vast amounts of structured and unstructured information, can reconcile ambiguous and even self-contradictory data, and can learn. In this partnership, the two – human and machine – are more effective than either one alone.Much like the human brain, these systems begin to build models of themselves and the world around them. This world consists of the system itself, the knowledge ingested from information corpora and the users of the system. The models include the contextual relationships between various entities in a system’s world that enable it to form hypotheses and arguments.As a result, these systems are able to engage in deep dialogue with humans.  In the future, increasingly more domain-specific question and answer (Q&A) systems are expected to emerge. Additionally, future cognitive systems will advance to have free form dialogue and reasoning capabilities.The big question is will Cognitive Computing Robots spell Dome for the American Worker.                     The Rise of the Machine  Robot Replacements may leave Millions Jobless.Many company's such as Lowes, McDonalds, Amazon, are using robots with great success.  In the near future, you might be surprised to visit the giant hardware store in your town and find yourself greeted by a chatty robot rather than a human sales assistant.A harbinger of this age of robotic shopping is being trialled with two Oshbot robot sales assistants at an Orchard Supply Hardware store in San Jose, California. Built by Lowe’s Innovation Labs and Silicon Valley technology company Fellow Robots using "science fiction prototyping," the OSHbots are designed to not only identify and locate merchandise, but to speak to customers in their own languages.Lowes OSHbots Sales Assistant               McDonalds Robots                      Amazons Robots      Corporations Win Big with Robots Zero Wages, Benefits etc.          2030 Ideal Family  for CorporationsRobots That have the ability to think for themselves.What Next?                                                                                                 Riveting ArticlesAbout amazing cool things straight out of Science Fiction such as Wearable Technology  Technology is advancing rapidly and the enormous amount of information collected thru the use of the internet, cell phone, cameras and other Technology per minute  per hour in all areas of our life is staggering. This explosion of data has lead to new terms being created like Big Data and Data Exhaust.Steve Weber a professor at the University of California School of Information's data science program states"I'm wearing sensors, and everything I interact with is instrumented in some fashion. It starts to become mind-boggling, both in terms of what we can know, and the almost unlimited number of things we can do with that data."That depends, of course, on whether the information is collected and analyzed, ideally by well intentioned parties."People sometimes use the term 'data exhaust' [to describe] all the data that their interaction with the world is throwing off, and how little of it gets collected," says Weber.The Drawback Question Will Big Data mean a complete and total end to Privacy   None. of your data is safe.   according to writer Jeffrey Van Camp. “None of these services (cloud storage companies) guarantee the protection of any files you upload, and there are no promises that these services won’t freely share your files and information with the government or other companies.”             It  Gets Worse.  In a recent article in the Huffington Post “the CTO of the CIA, Ira "Gus" Hunt said that the world is increasingly awash in information from text messages, tweets, and videos -- and that the agency wants all of it.” Not only that, the agency wants to keep it “forever.”  Be Careful What you Post Online.Maybe it's time to return to earlier old, old forms of communication that are more private and personal, TALKING and LETTER WRITING .                    Industrial SolutionsGlobal Solutions Magazine will provide listings of solutions necessary for Business in a market that's constantly changing.  Global Solutions Magazine will provide new products Developed, listed by Industry, Solution, Product name, Description and a link to Company's website for further details.  We will also list Company's with various problems for which they are seeking solutions. Global Solutions Magazine is Tech -Savvy and will keep you up to date on new technological advances but  that's not all we are multi-dimensional and well balanced with fun, Entertainment and monetization. Connect your Ingenuity to OpportunityGlobal Solutions Magazine allows you to upload your video or text on any topic or subject The Video can be provided free or monetized. A video advertised globally by Global Solutions Magazine can receive 100 to 1,000,000 views or more  Fueling Growth and Profitability with your Information ,Solutions, Entertainment and more making the World work Better.Using Global Solutions Magazine pay-per-view video hosting you'll receive payments immediately to your selected online merchant account.                               Own a Business with live Entertainment Upload your Event                          Book your Bands next gig by Uploading a Preview Of your performance in the Entertainment section Of Global Solutions Magazine. Reach a Global Audience.                         Global Solutions Magazine is more than just a Magazine.Showcase and Monetize your  Personal Talent.                                                                             ACCEPT PAYMENTS WORLDWIDE                  Global Solution Magazine Will also provide Exciting Adventurous and Fun articles of interest in many category's including; Arts and EntertainmentApartment Rental and Real EstateAuto SUV and Truck story:
Thanks For Your Contribution!

By contributing you are helping make the dream of a fully transparent car industry across the nation. 

Isn't it about time?

We thought so too...

Working in the Automotive Industry for years, we saw first hand how people would take shortcuts to make a quick dollar.

Many times disregarding the persons needs and desires, and pushing forward to get a sale without caring about the satisfaction of the client.

Introducing F&I DIRECT

With over 25 years of Automotive retail experience under our belts, we decided that it was time for a change and do things a new way...

That's why we created F&I DIRECT; A training and consulting firm that focuses on educating consumers and teaching dealerships the New Way Of Doing  Business Right.

We are launching this campaign in order to spread the message of a transparency in Automotive financing, as well as empowering consumers by educating them in the finance process.

With your help we will be able to build our educational campaigns for consumers as well as hiring the right people for the mission.

We understand that we are taking on the tall task of changing an industry that has been doing things the same way for a really long time.

We know that we will face resistance, and that a lot of dealerships will not like that we are doing this...

But we know that we MUST move forward in order to put an end to deceptive dealership practices!

Our Goal is: $20,000

With Your Support We Will Be Able To:

-Get Audio and Video Equipment for the studio, where we will be recording all new content to benefit consumers.

-Hire the right people to spread this message across the nation.

-Purchase the Equipment we need

-Invest in software to bring you an easier buying experience from the confort of your home and avoid the dealership all together.

For Your Contribution:

You will receive a reward according to your Pledge!!!

Take a look to see which one you will make yours.

The Impact

Together we can build the future of Car Buying. 

Imagine a future were you are no longer fearful to walk into a dealership because you don't know if they are going to try to "rake you through the coals"

Imagine being empowered with information that will make the dealer shake in their boots, and think "How does this person know to ask that"

Image being able to walk into the dealership with full confidence that you can trust that dealership because you know that they're working with F&I DIRECT and you know that they have been taught the right way of doing your paperwork.

Together we can keep the automotive industry honest and help make it transparent and consistent.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Be sure to like and share our campaign on your Social Media.
  • Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
