story:
Project Tipping Point- a personal story about community

I am Shanna Cox, Founder of Project Tipping Point. Over 7 years ago, I moved my family to the downtown neighborhood in Lewiston, Maine to begin a new life. My  work in our city clarified the interdependence of many community issues- substandard and hazardous housing, failing schools and low graduation rates,  high rates of poverty and poor community health. These issues weren't just my day to day work- they were my environment, and my children's future if some pretty important things didn't change. 

     


     In my work, I would see great folks- lots of them- week after week at meetings. I realized that there were conversations about community problems and solutions happening in disconnected pockets.

Project Tipping Point's TIP L/A Leader Development Program is the way back to a connected community- it's about commitment to our future, the possibility of tomorrow, and achievable solutions.  Taking 40 community leaders and innovators on an 18 month, 9 session journey of personal and professional growth and learning, the TIP L/A Leader Program will create a robust and growing network of collaborative leaders skilled and practiced in managing change for Lewiston Auburn.

And that is just the beginning. 

The first 40 will become part of an active alumni network of 160 change makers by 2024. The TIP L/A Leader Program is focusing on the people, and the networks they live and work in. We know that by connecting skilled leaders, we can create a strong and robust networks that increases the flow of resources, information and innovative ideas- and will transform community. 

Supporting us is supporting our leaders- half of our goal and any funds that are raised beyond that becomes scholarships for participants- making it possible to ensure a network that is diverse in its socioeconomic, education and sector characteristics. We know that a network that represents the whole community will be more able to find the solutions that create lasting change. 


Our goal- $10,000

We have already privately raised $44,000, but we need $10,000 to get us over the finish line! Your support will: 

·  Cover the remaining startup costs (investments in space, design and our team)

·  Start the scholarship fund to support our leaders' learning

·  Ensure quality learning environments and materials for leaders

The Impact

The TIP L/A Leader Development Program will alter the course of our participants lives- and transform the future of our community. For those in L/A, this is an opportunity to support the people and connections we need to ensure we are working towards a common future. The individual learning and growth coupled with the network's strengthening, diversification and expansion will change the way we approach our toughest problems. It will give our people the skills and confidence needed to try new solutions, disrupt the status quo, and proudly commit to our community. 

For those outside of L/A-this is an opportunity to support social innovation. This is a marriage of leadership development and place based community change- two great social change models. We are sure the marriage of these two models will be the peanut butter and jelly of social innovation- a combination that once tried, can't be separated again. We are eager to test it, evaluate it, and share our success with other communities facing similar, complex problems. 

Ways to support L/A and Social Innovation

If you can, support us by contributing to our campaign. 

We know some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help us build the buzz we need- share this on your Facebook, website or other social media platforms. 
  • Tell someone you know- tell them about what we are doing, and why it matters to you. 
  • Apply or nominate someone at gotippingpoint.com, and help us weave our network of change makers

story:
This is Christopher.

 

Why A Bakery?

For as long as I've been alive, our father has been baking a Vanilla Wafer Cake. He basically takes some vanilla wafer cookies, mixes them with raisins, shredded coconut, pecans and dried cranberries, throws it in the oven and a few hours later, there's a delectable dessert sitting on the kitchen counter. My brother and I would giggle uncontrollably as our father would use a rolling pin to smash vanilla wafers until it looked like flour. Of course, our mother wasn't too fond of it, but we loved it. We also loved licking the batter off the mixing beaters. As the years have passed, the equipment has changed - food processors have replaced rolling pins and stand mixers have replaced hand mixers - but the fantastic taste has remained the same. 

Our Standard Vanilla Wafer Cake Includes Raisins, Shredded Coconut, Dried Cranberries and Pecans.

We Use No Flour, But Real Vanilla Wafer Cookies In All Of Our Vanilla Wafer Cakes.

You Should Love Your Dessert, So We Made Our Vanilla Wafer Cakes Completely Customizable. Request an ingredient be added or taken away. 

Ok, I'm In, But Why Do You Need The Money?

Our bakery is strictly online. There is no physical store, but we need an industrial kitchen to bake our cakes. Baking our cakes costs by the hour, so we need initial funds to help get us off the ground. This kickstarter allows us to get those funds and reward YOU with perks such as free cakes, tote bags and mugs for helping us without mortgaging our future with debt. Beyond access to an industrial kitchen, we need to wholesale the ingredients of our baked goods, and this will allow us to order those initial goods early and get us off the ground. If our campaign is not fully funded in the 30 days, any donations made will go towards everything mentioned above. 

Wait, There's One More Thing...

This bakery isn't just about profits. We donate a percentage of ALL sales to the Miami Children's Health Foundation for neuroscience and epilepsy research. 

According to the Centers for Disease Control, about 5 million people in the United States have a history of epilepsy and almost 3 million have active epilepsy. 1 in every 1,000 people with epilepsy die suddenly from a seizure - like Christopher.

It was painful to grow up with Christopher and have to make multiple trips to the hospital for brain surgeries and CT scans. No one wants to only see their brother in a hospital bed for weeks at a time. This is our effort to eliminate that suffering for those people and families afflicted by epilepsy.

Who am I?

 

My name is Courtenay Harris and I'm Christopher's brother. This project and business is deeply personal to me. I was born 6 years before Christopher, which made me old enough to fully experience the effects of his condition on both him and our family. I spent a lot of my youth visiting my brother in his hospital rooms and when he was at home, I spent an inordinate amount of time keeping my eyes on him so that I could catch him when he fell - literally. 

These experiences changed and affected me. I dreamed of finding a cure for epilepsy during those long hospital days and nights. When Christopher died, it cemented my desire to help - somehow, someway. As an adult, I eventually began teaching. I initially wanted to teach special education and disabled students - a way to give to others the way Christopher's teacher so unselfishly gave our family the love we needed. I never got to teach those students, but did teach electives to many students who felt they didn't have hope. 

Through all of this, I never forgot about my brother and all that he experienced. I still wanted to find that cure for epilepsy and after giving it a lot of thought, I realized that no one could do it for me. I had to do it myself. I decided to stop teaching and dedicate myself to remembering Christopher and using something that Christopher loved to bring help and relief to others struggling like he so often did.

This bakery is very personal for me. Success for the bakery means success for Christopher - even in death.

Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand if you are unable to contribute but there are other ways you can still help us out, so I’m asking you to spread the word about our endeavors to as many people as you can. There is no promotion quite like word of mouth.

You can also use the Indiegogo share tools and spread the word through Facebook and Twitter. 

Thank you!

You can also use the Indiegogo share tools and spread the word through Facebook and Twitter. 
Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

I am Arnaldo Brown, Farmer and Founding Member of the Portmore Agriculture Cooperative Society Limited which was registered in June 2013. I am a registered Farmer since 2009.

Portmore Agricultural Cooperative Society is a contract farming group focused on community development.  Our campaign is designed to provide a solution to supply side constraints for one of the main ingredients that goes into authentic Jamaican hot pepper sauces - West Indian Red Pepper. We are passionate about this project because it prevent Jamaica from having to import pepper mash to produce this signature Jamaican project whilst providing employment opportunity for 100 persons.

Your investment will enable us to continue tantalizing the worlds taste buds with an authentic Jamaican recipe and product by putting 40 acres of land into production thus cultivating 900,000 lbs of pepper per year. Let's spice up the whole world. 

What We Need & What You Get

The project requires an investment of US$100,000.00. We have already raised US$20,000.00. Our shortfall is US$80,000.00, to be used as follows, 

  • US$40,000.00 for drip irrigation system covering 40 acres
  • US$20,000.00 to construct a Farm House and Amenities for workers as well as visitors
  • US$10,000.00 to acquire Agricultural Drone technology for surveillance as well as fertilizing the crop.
  • US$10,000.00 for Labour related issues and cash flow support until harvesting. 
  • Our unique perks are as follows,
  • Investors of US$30.00 or more will be issued with a Membership Certificate.
  • Investors of US$50.00 or more will be issued with a Share Certificate.
  • Investors of US$100.00 or more will be given authentic Jamaican Blue Mountain Coffee gift  package.
  • Funds will go to building the Farm House and Amenities for workers and visitors if entire goal is not met.

The Impact

 Our project is valuable to the contributor and to the world because your investment will ensure that the great Jamaican sauces remains on the palates of the world whilst contributing to economic development at the community level.

  • last year we successfully produced 70,000 lbs of pepper and employed 178 persons.
  • we are seeking to scale up operation and become the largest and most efficient pepper farm in the Jamaica.

Risks & Challenges

With agriculture the vicissitudes of the weather, the threat of insects and disease are ever present. There is also threats from praedial larcenist, hence the use of drones..

  • In terms of the weather we are past the worst with the hurricane season set to end on November 30.
  • Having regard to disease and insects we have a schedule to treat the plants with environmentally friendly solutions and to  plant border crops such as cassava
  • Drone technology will assist in the overall security of the Farm

Other Ways You Can Help

You can support us by:

  • Getting the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Let us spice up the whole world!

.

story:
ONUSblue is the world's first skin based alcohol detection patch, it changes color while you drink becoming darker and darker shades of blue and provides a visual indication of alcohol consumption.

           

 

ONUSblue patch features


  

 

 

                                                                            Our prototype at work
                                                            

 

How can it be used?

               

 

                        

     

       Timeline    

                      

           

Press and Allies

 

 

Why are we crowdfunding?

We are crowdfunding to raise $50,000, which is needed to begin production and set up large scale manufacturing capability.

What do you get?

You will be the first to receive this unique product. Use it at parties, the bar, sporting events, or give it to your friends—it’s simple to use ONUSblue and its responsible and wise—and even fun.

 

 

          Why did we develop ONUSblue?

 

Most alcohol detection happens after the fact, after arrests, deaths and accidents; this is of course too late.

 

Our patch detects alcohol consumption preemptively by changing color when an individual is still drinking.

 

It can be used by peers, bar owners, parents, and police to ensure responsible drinking. One person dies in the U.S. every hour due to drunk driving. Current testing methods are clumsy, inconvenient and focus on the aftermath; arrests, deaths, and accidents.

 

 

Why is ONUSblue better?

ONUSblue offers a better way: an easily obtainable, inexpensive, and simple device—a patch that changes color when it senses alcohol in the body. It will cost less than a cup of coffee and will be the most affordable, versatile, and easy way to test for alcohol. 

 

Who are we?

         We are an Albuquerque-based startup committed to              creating lasting social change through biosensor                    technology. We are a small team of chemical engineers          and business people with a focus on eliminating                      alcohol abuse and its ravages, death and personal                  injury.

 

 

Other Ways to support

Join us and contribute any amount you can via the "back us" button, every dollar counts. Show your commitment to save lives and end drunk driving. Finally, share our campaign via social media and help us get the word out about this worthwhile, lifesaving product.

story:
Why Patria Coffee?

Patria Coffee began as a solution to the work-family balance; we converted our garage to a coffee workshop and to roast coffee and sell online. Now it's time to realize the vision of creating community-minded space.  

We live and work here in the City of Compton.  As of now there is not an independent Coffeehouse in the city.  This is not because residents don't want one; currently our neighbors leave the city to catch up with a friend, work, or study.  While there are a couple of big chain coffeehouses, there are few local alternatives for those who want ethically sourced, sustainably  produced, organic options.  In addition to creating a place to grab a cup of coffee or a snack, we want to amplify community enrichment already happening, like poetry and art nights or panels to discuss relevant issues, all while staffing with a local workforce that is paid a dignified wage.  

What We Need & What You Get

If you help us reach our funding goal, we will be able to open our doors debt free, which will lead to the ability to hire local employees sooner and expand our opening hours.  

Funding of the campaign will also support:

  • Architectural and other professional services
  • New Drain Vent Sewage system up to code
  • New Electrical system up to code
  • New Heating system up to code
  • Title 24 Compliance (State energy efficient requirements)
  • Building Permits
  • Equipment
  • Job Training

The Impact

Prioritizing both our local community and the communities of growers that source our coffee is important to us, and that is true for the process of opening this coffee house as well.  For example, the work on the space will be completed by a contractor who gives employment opportunities to folks who may typically be shut out of the labor market for a variety of reasons.  Before we open our doors, and after, our guiding value is "in the City, for the City."  

Our efforts to open a community-conscious small business do not exist in isolation; there is already a groundswell of local businesses that believe that it is in their best interest to prioritize their neighbors and that running a successful business does not just mean maximizing profits.  

If you share our value that access to quality coffee should not be determined by the neighborhood you live in, and if you believe that all communities should have environments where relationships and ideas can flourish, consider supporting our campaign.  

Risks & Challenges

Sometimes when we talk to people about our desire to open a coffeehouse, the response we get is "...Compton, huh?"   Our city still is famous for the wrong reasons, and some are skeptical that a business like this can be successful in our city.  But we know that for every act of violence and tragedy that makes it onto the evening news, there are also other countless stories of families banding together through tough times, supporting their families, and celebrating the milestones of life. 

Coffee does not have a high profit margin.  However, Patria Coffee  has a solid base of subscription and wholesale monthly sales that can already begin to cover the cost of overhead.  Having a commercial space will only expand our opportunities to sell to other like-minded businesses and organizations.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

While it may be our names on this campaign, our doors will never open without the committed support of many people.  Even if you are not able to contribute financially, please use your influence to share this campaign with your family and friends.  Our funding goal is attainable if as many people as possible give whatever amount they are able.

story:
Hello Everyone,

Thank you for visiting our IndieGoGoTM page for SIDO (Sustainable Increasing and Decreasing Ownership) System powered by SidoSoft (SaaS technology). Dubbem Global has teamed up with the great people at IndieGoGoTM to raise funding for a software system that manage the ownership of revenue-producing assets participating in SIDO scheme. Please make a pledge; contribute by purchasing one or more vouchers and receive awesome rewards including codified notes (certificates) for all future references.

1.0 What about SIDO System?

SIDO system is an innovative strategy facilitating the gradual movement of creative ownership of revenue-producing assets from revenue investors to investees to employees/customers and occasionally from customers back to investees (asset managers). In general, SIDO scheme is based on the concept of sustainable, simultaneous increasing and decreasing ownership system powered by SidoSoft (cloud-based, SaaS technology solution) and driven by financial innovations. SIDO system is about leveraging technology, innovation, and strategy to disrupt traditional approach to ownership of assets.  SIDO scheme is about how time, technology, creativity, innovation, strategy, entrepreneurship, and relationships combine together to transform conventional ownership models.

2.0 Why SIDO System? - Problems Solved through SIDO Schemes

Around the world, impact-driven investors want to enter and exit from profitable investment opportunities but deeply concerned about the associated risks, liquidity, and other investment related issues. At the same time, asset managers and economically active young people want to enter and grow equity ownership in some investment opportunities but there are huge barriers or obstacles – lack of jobs/steady income, high cost of capital, unaffordable credit, and expensive cash based transactions. Thus, SIDO schemes aim to achieve these:

§ Make it simpler and smarter for revenue investors to safely and profitably enter and exit from various investment opportunities in key sectors of the economy – mainly housing/construction, agriculture, transport, trade, technology, and financial services. This way, investors can securely create shared wealth and build inclusive prosperity.

§ Make it cheaper and easier for asset managers and economically active young people to gradually build equity ownership in investment opportunities in key sectors of the economy. This way, young people are given the chance to cheaply purchase and own durable, tangible, valuable assets like houses/apartments at the early stages of their lives and careers.

§ Make it possible for young people to use their equity ownership as collateral or security for accessing affordable credit from various sources and contribution towards mortgage loan.

3.0 Designing and Developing SidoSoft – Software as a Service

Successful implementation of SIDO system requires the development of SidoSoft to automate the SIDO processes. SidoSoft is designed as cloud-based and SaaS technology solution for ownership intelligence and innovation management for selected revenue sensitive assets. SidoSoft is an important collaboration platform for preparing small businesses and employees/customers to become qualified to access affordable credit by integrating access to jobs, income, savings, ownership, credit and insurance. SidoSoft will grow to become a powerful new tool for digital disruption of traditional ownership models for certain revenue-producing assets with a special focus on real estate. The software will be developed by System Variant Limited and marketed by Dubbem Global Investment. 

4.0 Why Now for SidoSoft and SIDO system?

The modern world is presently talking about inclusive business, currency innovation, financial inclusion, impact investment, employment, access to credit, economic prosperity, creative capitalism (Gates foundation), resilient cities (Rockefeller foundation) and sustainable development (United Nations). As a result, entrepreneurs at Dubbem Global have recently developed SIDO system to show how all these are linked to sustainable impact investment, trade, and transfer through connecting investors and investees, investees and young people; plus present and future. Above all, the world’s credit system including conventional mortgage is currently NOT working for millions of economically active young people and their small businesses mainly in developing countries! Hence, new strategies like SIDO system are required to improve access to affordable credit. Surely, we need alternative, innovative approaches to creatively address the problem of lack of access to affordable credit.

5.0 What the entrepreneurial team needs from you

To develop and promote SidoSoft as a tool for advancing SIDO system, entrepreneurs at Dubbem Global need financial assistance and technical support from the general public. We need the support of everyone interested in understanding the roles of time, trade, technology (Internet), creativity, strategy, social network, ideas, innovation, and money (conventional and complementary) in advancing impact investing through SIDO. We want to raise ten thousand US dollars (US$10,000) through the crowd-funded initiative. This will enable us to develop SidoSoft plus online collaboration platform/marketplace for SIDO system. The success of the crowd-funding campaign will assist us to secure low-interest debt financing from suitable financial institutions promoting intelligent ownership trade powered by SidoSoft.  

6.0 How you can help

We are developing this fundraising campaign to solicit for your support which may be financial or in-kind (technical support, advice, and suggestions). Please feel free to donate any amount you can. Each donation procures a codified voucher. Regardless of whatever you donate, you will be issued a certificate of appreciation/recognition which will reflect amount donated and number of coded vouchers rewarded. We are issuing out 1,000 coded vouchers or pledge slots for this campaign and each voucher represents a value of ten dollars (US$10) as our funding goal is to reach ten thousand US dollars (US10,000) from this crowd-funded support campaign.

7.0 What You Get – Your Immediate and Future Rewards

Each contribution or donation will receive a ‘thank you letter’ plus coded certificate (soft copy) as evidence of your contribution and for reference purposes. This is in addition to other rewards (see below indicated in Perks). In future, if SidoSoft becomes successful, your donation will be turned into debt finance or equity investment in SIDO projects. To do this, we will request that donors and supporters provide copies of their certificates as evidence. In view of this, we ask that everyone keep their codified certificates safe and secure for future use.

Thank you very much.

story:
Overview

Derived from the thousands of dollars wasted playing at mediocre fields; Challenger Airsoft was conceived to provide all players with an experience that would be considered elite. Whether you join us for parties, large battles or military simulation; we want our facilities to exceed expectations. Your imagination should not have to transform a plywood box into a tank. Your imagination shouldn't have to tell you why stacks of trash exist in the woods to fight behind. We don't want to demean our competition; what we want is the opportunity to share our passion for the sport and break stagnation. We want to capture the high octane competition of the first person shooter. This is not just a field. We want to provide you with a stage. Challenger Airsoft will bring a real and immersive set to life using full size structures and real steel props.

 

 

 

 

Attendees have the opportunity to participate in a variety of arenas; Including but not limited to the chance to compete in ranked play and regular team tournaments. Through participation with major vendors, manufacturers, and interested partners; we have an opportunity to take this competitive level play to the internet and various broadcasting avenues. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Although other traditional funding opportunities are available, we want to bring our passion to the community. Challenger Airsoft is designed to take control of the airsoft market as the premier location of events, and showcase game play. We want to provide players with a groundbreaking facility with immersive scenarios. With the help of our closest supporters we can ensure that we can share this with the airsoft community. We want all contributors to feel like they are progressing the sport and creating something new and exciting.

 

 

 

 

In order to cover all expenses an estimated $750,000 is needed. What you help us with is everything from operating cost to construction of the field. If we do not hit our funding goal, any money raised will still go towards the development of our company. Perks will be rewarded regardless and anything raised will be immeasurably appreciated. We want you all to be apart of this.

Some props to look forward to being placed on the field:

  • A Railroad Freight Yard including
    • Boxcars
    • Passenger Cars
    • Switch-tower
    • Fully constructed Freight Depot and rail- yard.
  • Trench System
  • Shipping Containers
  • Various Military/Civilian Vehicles
  • Fire-bases
  • Buried bunkers 
  • Ruined town and sprawling buildings.
  • A field with logical progression between sub divided areas.

 

 

 

 

A field of this stature is something players in the tri-state region have talked about for years. Contribution to our venture will not only guarantee the listed rewards but also a permanent place of recognition in what we believe to be the catalyst for explosive growth of the sport. 

 

The Impact

Bringing strategic map design unified with creative events and production, Challenger has nothing but the players in mind. With your generosity we can ensure the necessary steps are taken to deliver the product the way it is intended. We don't want to cut any corners when constructing the field and each and every donation can be the difference between achieving our goals and having to piece the field together over time. We want you to be able to see the difference your donation made!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Apart from donations, the biggest contribution you can make is by sharing our page with friends and family. Our social media presence is vital towards our marketing efforts and any like or share would be greatly appreciated. We currently have a presence on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and are always uploading and eager to answer any questions or concerns you have. Also feel free to email us at Funding.ChallengerAirsoft@Outlook.com!

story:
Live Good - Environmental Health & Human Rights

Click Here To Learn More About Us!

Our Story 

Live Good, Inc. was founded in 2012 as a direct response to current deplorable manufacturing conditions. As an international investigator examining factory production in Asia and working on human rights cases, Live Good Founder saw first hand the devastating toll present-day mass manufacturing has on human rights and the environment. Live Good was created to juxtapose this outdated, environmentally and socially destructive model, and catapult all manufacturing practices into the 21st century built on triple bottom line and long-term sustainability principles.

Our goal is to model and inspire conscientious manufacturing: promoting local, organic methods that make a positive impact on people and the planet. By manufacturing in the United States, Live Good can ensure that the highest standards of hygiene and fair labor practices are maintained. All products are manufactured in California using 100% certified organic source materials and eco-conscious, community-minded practices.

Learn more about us: http://livegoodinc.com/about 

Our Mission

We all want to live a good life — one in which we contribute something positive to the world. But we also yearn for "the good life," a state in which our own mental and physical health is in balance.

At Live Good, success is-

-The number of workers earning a living wage.

-The number of acres left unspoiled by poison and pesticides

-The number of people living lives of comfort and knowing that it does not come at the expense of the environment, their community or their conscience.

Let’s change the way business is done!

Interview With Olympic Gold Medalist- Misty Hyman

Our Product

Live Good products are tangible expressions of our value. We only work with the most respected names in manufacturing, so that we can ensure compliance with environmental and ethical standards. We are extremely proud to be able to offer Organic Supima Live Good products, and part of what makes them so special is the incredible supply chain behind them.

 

Live Good crafts all of its bedding, pillow, and baby products from 100% certified organic materials. The result is unsurpassed luxury and sustainability that brings natural, lasting comfort to your home. Every production run takes between 3-4 months from start to finish! 

Perks

 

Thank you so much for your support. We have the most talented and passionate community in the world, and we are pleased to welcome you to the Live Good Team!

For further inquiries, please contact: customerservice@livegoodinc.com.

Our goal is to model and inspire conscientious manufacturing: promoting local, organic methods that make a positive impact on people and the planet. By manufacturing in the United States, Live Good can ensure that the highest standards of hygiene and fair labor practices are maintained. All products are manufactured in California using 100% certified organic source materials and eco-conscious, community-minded practices.
Learn more about us: http://livegoodinc.com/about 
Our Mission
We all want to live a good life — one in which we contribute something positive to the world. But we also yearn for "the good life," a state in which our own mental and physical health is in balance.
At Live Good, success is-
-The number of workers earning a living wage.
-The number of acres left unspoiled by poison and pesticides
-The number of people living lives of comfort and knowing that it does not come at the expense of the environment, their community or their conscience.
Let’s change the way business is done!
Interview With Olympic Gold Medalist- Misty Hyman

Our Product
Live Good products are tangible expressions of our value. We only work with the most respected names in manufacturing, so that we can ensure compliance with environmental and ethical standards. We are extremely proud to be able to offer Organic Supima Live Good products, and part of what makes them so special is the incredible supply chain behind them.
 
Live Good crafts all of its bedding, pillow, and baby products from 100% certified organic materials. The result is unsurpassed luxury and sustainability that brings natural, lasting comfort to your home. Every production run takes between 3-4 months from start to finish! 

Perks

 
Thank you so much for your support. We have the most talented and passionate community in the world, and we are pleased to welcome you to the Live Good Team!
For further inquiries, please contact: customerservice@livegoodinc.com.

story:
Le principe ?

Le Veera Boxing Bordeaux (club spécialisé en Muay Thaï), l’Annexe Coaching Sport (boxing bag, cross training, coaching personnel) la Petite Gironde (restaurant situé sur la rive droite de Bordeaux) et l’agence LS2 (cabinet d'architectes paysagistes et urbanistes) vous offrent la possibilité de participer au projet Muay Thaï Xtrem Europe, un gala de boxe thaï pour les initiés ou amateurs qui souhaitent (re)découvrir une discipline dans un cadre non conventionnel.

Où ?

La Halle Ponsan, ancien abattoir sur les quais de Paludates : https://goo.gl/mqqUa7

Quand ?

Le 1er octobre 2016 à partir de 20h.

Pourquoi ?

L’idée d'organiser un gala de boxe Thai à Bordeaux est née de la volonté de deux clubs sportifs (Veera Boxing et L'Annexe) de s’associer pour créer un évènement d’exception. L'idée est de vous proposer ce premier évènement dans l'objectif de développer à terme un gala annuel retransmis sur Canal+ et en live sur Youtube (et en 3D en plus #réalitéaugmentée).

story:
Short Summary

Jimmy Fish is a playful western take on the Japanese fisherman. Growing up a big fan of anime culture combined with my recent career move to the Florida Keys, I felt incorporating a sushi theme into a fishing lifestyle brand would be fun!

What We Need & What You Get

The funding:

  • Aiming for $2,000 we hope to accomplish initial branding phases, begin working on new designs, and produce our very first t-shirt for you guys! ^_^ 
  • Pledges will receive our very first t-shirt design featuring Jimmy Fish himself along with a handwritten thank you letter from Jim Fisher! ^_^
  • Donations are also greatly appreciated! ^_^
  • If we do not achieve our total goal of $2k we will use what has been pledged to continue the brand as fast as we can! ^_^

The Impact

What makes Jimmy Fish different?:

  • There are many other fishing lifestyle brands out there but none with the fun eastern anime influence like ours! ^_^
  • I have been building brands since the age of 18- my first also dealing with eastern design aesthetics. ^_^ 

Risks & Challenges

  • If full funding is not achieved production may take a little longer to complete. ^_^
  • We will continue to get the word out until we raise enough funding for our very first order! ^_^

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't pledge $$$:

  • Share with all your friends on social medias! ^_^
  • Indiegogo has plenty of share tools to utilize also! ^_^

And that's all there is to it! ^_^

story:
Project Description:

The Cocktail Parlor is a bakery hosting cupcakes, cookies, and other desserts inspired by classic and modern cocktails. We strive to bring the renaissance of the cocktail industry to a new realm; the edible cocktail. From an Old Fashioned or Negroni cupcake, to a Dark & Stormy or Rob Rose cookie, each resembles its cocktail elder in dessert form. It is our goal to maintain the vitality and romanticism of the cocktail industry, one new confectionery at a time.  

As our company grows, we need a little bit of help from our community. The plan is to raise enough money to begin the process of applying for a large loan from a bank. Banks need some kind of collateral in order to accept your loan proposal. If you apply for a loan, they expect you to already have at least 25% of that loan. In order to begin the process of opening the bakery & bar we need at least a $120,000 loan. So, the goal? We've got to bring $30,000 to the bank, or more if we can.

We have a complete business plan, associated projected sales, and an itemized budget that exceeds the norm and fits several different scenarios. What does that mean? We're ready to roll with the punches.

 

Biography:

I’m a bartender by trade, and a baker by blood. 

I always wanted to open a café. When I was 12 I would draw up plans of design, create fake menus, and host lunches and dinners for my family. The idea of the café transformed over time into a consolidated plan for a bar and bakery. It truly couldn’t fit me any better.

I am a baking enthusiast with an eye for detail, an avidity for flavor and texture balance, and a gift of rationale and comprehension of the human experience, on a path to build a cocktail and cupcake haven, revolving in solace.

Overall in the state of any inspiration, we are all on a scavenger hunt, searching for our own definition of humanity and, as much as personally allotted, allowing the influences of the world take its toll on our inner beings. I strive for the things I want to accomplish. I think rationally and analytically with heaps of curiosity. I love thoroughly and passionately. I strive for something greater than the preliminary outlook of life. A friend once told me, “I know that of the two of us, you were, are, have been, and will always be the strongest. It’s because you love so hard— you live with your heart.”

 

Fundraising Packages:

The fundraising packages are meant to be a gift to show our gratitude for helping us meet our goal.  If we don’t meet our entire funding goal, the money raised will still go to the process of getting a loan, the timeline will just be extended. If we exceed the funding goal, the money raised will still go to the process of getting a loan, but the timeline will be expedited!

 

The Challenges & Risks:

Every business knows the possible risks and meets new challenges on a daily basis. With ours, the financial aspect of the business is our biggest challenge. But that’s why we’re here! We’re looking for ways to introduce ourselves to the community while also getting the community to feel involved in our growth. After all, our most favorite hashtag is #cupcakesforthepeople.

Once we've opened the bakery & bar, we have a strict plan to gain and then raise sales, to attract new customers, to create new integrated products, and to always maintain quality.

Our most significant risk is the industry. Despite that we have a new concept that's appealing to a large audience we are still in an industry that has a 90% failing rate. How can we avoid statistics? We can easily be in the 10% of successful bars and restaurants with what we offer:

- a great and unique product,

- high quality customer service,

- heightened attention to detail,

- integrated products on an ever-growing list,

- and event opportunities.

 

As the owner, this business is not only my dream, it's my life. There is nothing that can deter me to making a brick & mortar location into a reality. When a roadblock appears, we'll find the way around it by creating a new path. If there are rails making a new path impossible, we'll learn how to drive through concrete. You know, like Eggman in the Sonic the Hedgehog series, for the exception that he's the villain.

We are ready and willing to take on all of the risks and to shake hands with all of the challenges that arise. Whether it be a leaky faucet, or an out of date permit, we're ready to see it through.

 

If you’re unable to help fund this project, there are other ways you can help!

-  Please spread the word. Share this campaign, share the video, share the story.

-  Stay up-to-date with our progress at www.thecocktailparlor.com

 

 

Cheers!

story:
Did you ever see a tattoo and think "I need something like that!" Have you ever walked down the street seeing people with tattoos and wondered where they got them?

Do you want to show of your beautiful ink to the world? Or do you want to find tattooed models for your advertising campaign or promotion?

Do you just love ink and do you want to find new ideas and inspiration for your own collection?

Then look no further! 
Discover: INKbase, The Tattoo Social Network!

Short Summary

INKbase is the first social media network that is centered solely around tattoos and everything surrounding it. INKbase will allow like-minded people and businesses to connect with each other for:

  • Photo and video sharing
  • Sharing current and upcoming events
  • Business endeavours
  • Dating
  • Educational purposes
  • And much more...

INKbase was conceived by instagram users who wanted a clear and orderly website/app to showcase their pride and joy: Tattoos! 

Whether you are a person who loves tattoos, a tattooed model, a tattooer or a tattoo ink salesman, INKbase is the place for you. 

What We Need & What You Get

The website is currently in development, and the funding here will help us to cover the costs of development partners, marketing, promotion, merchandising etc... 

The INKbase website will become reality whether we reach our funding or not, but the funding here will give us the opportunity to launch this project with a BANG! Every dollar will make INKbase bigger, bolder, more awesome, more famous and more beautiful!

And you can be a part of it! There are lots of great perks for those who contribute to this ground breaking website!

The Impact

Imagine having a social media profile where every single visitor is interested in your niche. Imagine having a tattoo shop and being able to promote yourself easily to all tattooed persons in your local area.
Imagine being a tattooed model and being able to connect with pages, websites, photographers, producers, magazines and much more. All of them interested in tattoos and tattooed models!
Imagine being a tattoo aftercare company and connecting easily with all local, national or international tattoo shops.
Imagine loving tattoos, and being able to see lots of them, every day. Getting inspiration, ideas, new friends and in the end... New ink!

Risks & Challenges

The only challenges we face are:

  • Getting the word out there;
  • Building a user friendly website;
  • Putting the INKbase brand on the map;
  • Totally owning this thing!!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, it's no problem at all, you can still help us by:

  • Telling your friends about this campaign;
  • Leaving comments or interesting ideas
  • Following us on Instagram: @inkbase.official or twitter: @INKbase92
  • Sharing our campaign to your friends and networks! (Tip: check out the Indiegogo share tools!)

Together we can make this work!

story:
The Building

Built in the everchanging early 70s, in the hart of the part of town which was destroyed in the great 1917 fire, it was originally intended to be a hotel establishment. Decades onwards and having hosted a series of offices and public services, it's currently undergoing a huge and costly aesthetical and structural makeover and renovation and will soon (with your help) stand fit to fulfil its destiny

The Wall

STAY takes pride in its friends, one of which is the renowned graffiti artist and mural designer SER, who loved the project since day one and has created the unique artwork you can see on the exterior building wall.

Why a youth hostel?

In an ever-changing world, travelling has become easier and much more affordable. Less border checking, common currencies, information availability, budget transport. However people often fail to grasp the real essence of travelling and tourism, which is to mingle with the locals, getting inside information to fully appreciate what the destination has to offer, having a place where you can really STAY! And can you have all that in a way that doesn't make your pockets bleed?

Of course! All you have to do is value the meaning of sharing... Youth hostels and common places are the quintessence of that notion. The same level of safety, hygiene and cleanliness you would expect in a star resort hotel at a small and affordable budget, plus a bunch of new great friends. A new way to discover what the city has to offer... and my oh my! what a great city this is...

The City

Greece's second largest city is by far the most youthful, cultural and fun city you will ever visit. The city's 2500+ year long history is evident round every corner, the fragrance of its multicultural mix is eminent, the favorable geographical positioning adds up to the breathtaking natural landscape, but the one thing that will truly amaze you is the pulse, the heartbeat, the vibrant city life. One of the few cities worldwide that can still boast the "city that never sleeps" motto. Although the city's population is over one-and-a-half million strong, it has a very compact and relatively small downtown district where most of the city's activity takes place. The country's largest student community lives here and leaves its distinct fingerprint on the impressive collection of cafes and restaurants, bars and taverns, shops and galleries, concert venues and clubs, that stay open until sunrise. Anything you fancy, you can find within short walking distance, making it a city, where you definitely wanna stay!

The Team

Music lovers, passionate travelers and urban life enthusiasts Z,Y,K, and friends are the driving force behind STAY. Affiliated with some of the city's landmark bars, clubs, cafes, taverns and concert venues, hospitality as-it-should-be is in their blood. In an effort to accompish that, a group of common-thinkers has been assembled to form the team which will be there to make your "STAY" easy, pleasant and memorable. So, go ahead and do not hesitate to make contact. Support and spread the word! In "STAY" we are all friends, sharing... 

The STAY project

A shared passion for travelling, urban life and music is the main triptych behind STAY Youth Hostel & Common Place. A downtown joint where you can find a safe and cozy shelter to fit your budget but also meet & mingle with the locals and other travelers, exchange tips & memories and eventually enjoy the city together and make new friends. Being enthusiastic travelers ourselves, we have always cherished the community feel we have encountered in youth hostels worldwide. That is the exact atmosphere and friendly environment we aim to provide for our guests, hoping it will be a place where everyone wants to STAY!So there you have it, we have a dream, we're working on it and we need your help to make it come true! Support and spread the word! Make it yours and prepare to ENJOY YOUR STAY!

story:
Summary

Orbis offers a holistic view to technology and utilization of resources that are at a client’s disposal.  Everything, from creating custom programs/applications for a customer to utilization of open source and freeware to solve today's business needs, is within our scope of expertise to assist with.  We offer availability to our client base as if they had a full team of IT professionals from developers to network engineers to the more common desktop support technician.  These services can be part of a managed services contract or called upon in an ad hoc means as needs arise.  We also offer the employee and public non-commercial depot and remote assistance for help with all of your home technological needs.   For those clients that are part of an established managed support services contract, these individual plans come at a lower price point for their employees. 

Market

The market is wide and varied as we offer commercial and residential/home remote support as well as commercial only on-site and managed services contracts and support.  Almost all companies have a need from time to time in order to solve technological issues.  More than that however is the need for uptime in a company's infrastructure.  No one can afford the all too common "our computer system is down".  At the end of the day, it affects the bottom line and that is not an acceptable business practice.  Orbis Technology Solutions offers SLAs(service level agreements) in order to ensure that up time and keep your business running.  All of our customers from the home business professional, the gamer and to the mid and large size enterprise want their technology to work for them, not to work for the technology.  That is where we add value.

Competition

Our competition ranges from Best Buy's Geek Squad services to other IT shops that offer pieces of the scope of services that we do.  Most IT managed services shops offer support such as Best Buy's model, they will support only items and applications that still have a degree of manufacturer support.  That differs from our business model greatly.  In addition to that difference which is detailed in the next section, the plethora of services offered by our competitors is normally limited to network and workstations and servers.  Orbis takes a much larger view of technological support.

Why Us?

Why us?  Many companies struggle to answer this simple question.  Orbis Technology Solutions does not.  Why us, a simple answer, we do more.  Starting with the typical servers, workstations and networking solutions is easy enough, but we expand out to assist in document imaging solutions, GPS solutions, printer management/maintenance, telecom and ISP solutions, phone systems and maintenance and configuration, call center solutions, warranty administration for manufacturers, workstation and server hardware sales and much more.

 Orbis is concerned at its core with leveraging any technology you need to get your job done.  That includes platforms that we would not benefit financially from as well.  Sometimes a simple freeware or web solution gives you what you need to address the issue.  Other times just a point in the right direction even if that is to another servicer or vendor is the right answer to the question.  In the end, Orbis is here to be your technological advocate above all else.  This engenders the trust necessary to advise our clients effectively and in good conscience to the end result that works best for their individual situation.  This is not just a sales mantra, it is rather an everyday, practicing ethos.

utilization of open source and freeware to solve today's business needs, is within our scope of expertise to assist with.  We offer availability to our client base as if they had a full team of IT professionals from developers to network engineers to the more common desktop support technician.  These services can be part of a managed services contract or called upon in an ad hoc means as needs arise.  We also offer the employee and public non-commercial depot and remote assistance for help with all of your home technological needs.   For those clients that are part of an established managed support services contract, these individual plans come at a lower price point for their employees. MarketThe market is wide and varied as we offer commercial and residential/home remote support as well as commercial only on-site and managed services contracts and support.  Almost all companies have a need from time to time in order to solve technological issues.  More than that however is the need for uptime in a company's infrastructure.  No one can afford the all too common "our computer system is down".  At the end of the day, it affects the bottom line and that is not an acceptable business practice.  Orbis Technology Solutions offers SLAs(service level agreements) in order to ensure that up time and keep your business running.  All of our customers from the home business professional, the gamer and to the mid and large size enterprise want their technology to work for them, not to work for the technology.  That is where we add value.CompetitionOur competition ranges from Best Buy's Geek Squad services to other IT shops that offer pieces of the scope of services that we do.  Most IT managed services shops offer support such as Best Buy's model, they will support only items and applications that still have a degree of manufacturer support.  That differs from our business model greatly.  In addition to that difference which is detailed in the next section, the plethora of services offered by our competitors is normally limited to network and workstations and servers.  Orbis takes a much larger view of technological support.Why Us?Why us?  Many companies struggle to answer this simple question.  Orbis Technology Solutions does not.  Why us, a simple answer, we do more.  Starting with the typical servers, workstations and networking solutions is easy enough, but we expand out to assist in document imaging solutions, GPS solutions, printer management/maintenance, telecom and ISP solutions, phone systems and maintenance and configuration, call center solutions, warranty administration for manufacturers, workstation and server hardware sales and much more. Orbis is concerned at its core with leveraging any technology you need to get your job done.  That includes platforms that we would not benefit financially from as well.  Sometimes a simple freeware or web solution gives you what you need to address the issue.  Other times just a point in the right direction even if that is to another servicer or vendor is the right answer to the question.  In the end, Orbis is here to be your technological advocate above all else.  This engenders the trust necessary to advise our clients effectively and in good conscience to the end result that works best for their individual situation.  This is not just a sales mantra, it is rather an everyday, practicing ethos.

story:
Our Story & Our Good Will Promise

Hello! My name is Yeung and I am a mother of two lovely toddlers. Since staying home full time, feeding and cleaning have become an integral part of my daily routines. Little children eat 5-6 times a day and being messy is inevitable. A little help from a well designed bib can reduce the mess to be cleaned up and sometimes even save the food that barely misses the little mouth. A functional feeding bib should catch food and liquid droppings in the chest area, and prevent soiling of clothes. Hard-molded plastic or silicone bibs are generally well suited for the tasks; however, they are less comfortable, rigid, heavy, bulky and require hand-washing. In fact, the launch of this project was driven by the unwillingness of my son to wear a hard plastic bib. I set out to design one that is comfortable, water-resistant and easy to clean. After a few weeks of twiddling around with paper towels, a basic design came to life. Soon after, I began making different versions of the bibs and trying them out on my toddler son. Very much to his liking was the attractive print and how comfortable it was for it to be made solely of fabrics. Ever since, he has been happy wearing the bib while eating and I have been happier not having to clean up as much or change his clothes as often. After spending months in tweaking and testing the design, I did not want the effort to go to waste. I thought that other parents may also be looking for a better alternative for feeding bibs. And voilà! here we are, trying to get some help to bring the bibs to the market so your little ones can also stay a little bit cleaner and the earth can also be a little greener with fewer plastic bibs.

As a small business for children accessories, not only do we want to share our useful products with other families, we also want to make a difference in children's lives around the world. We pledge to donate 5% of our proceeds annually, as well as funds raised through this campaign, to charity and research organizations whose programs directly benefit children. Our choice of charity for the first year is Save the Children because we admire their scope of work, the vast geographic areas they cover, and the high proportions of funds going into their programs. 

 

Features Of Our Bib

  • Soft and comfortable
  • Water resistant
  • Pocket stays open by gravity
  • Pocket can be disassembled for thorough cleaning
  • Machine washable
  • Fast drying
  • Attractive prints 
  • Light weight (1.4 oz) and compact for traveling
  • Patent pending

 

Detailed Specifications

  • Recommended age range: 6 months to 2.5 years
  • Materials: cover 100% cotton, lining 100% polyester, backing 100% polyester with durable water repellent finish (DWR*)
  • Overall size with pocket: 8"  wide x 10" long ; neck hole circumference: 10.5"
  • Care instruction: machine wash cold with like colors, hang dry or tumble dry extra low;  no  bleach, no softener; warm iron if needed
  • For optimal DWR* performance, sport wash/tech wash detergent is highly recommended
  • DWR* restoration may be required over time with polycotton wash-in
  • Designed and made in USA
  • CPSIA compliant

 

How The Pocket Comes Apart For Easy Cleaning

 

 

We Had Some Little Ones Test It Out

 

What We Need Help With

After much looking around within the U.S., we found a wonderful small-batch manufacturer that is able to produce the bibs within our personal budgets. Due to the unique appearance and features of the bib, the manufacturing method is tedious compared to that of other bibs, which translates into higher labor cost. Also, given the choice of high quality cotton print fabrics, the material cost of our bib is also on the high end. In order to bring our bibs to major retail stores at an affordable price, large scale production is necessary. We are in need of significantly larger amount of funds to cover scale up cost for materials, production, packaging and shipping. In addition, our bib is pending for a utility patent, thus we need as much help as we can get to cover the necessary legal cost.

The main goal of this campaign is to raise funds for domestic and offshore mass production of the bibs to bring to local major retail stores where parents can conveniently purchase our bibs at an affordable price. Without lowering the labor cost or producing the bibs at a large quantity, the per unit cost of limited supply will make the bib too costly to many and fewer families would benefit from this novel design bib. Your contribution is therefore critical to the realization of our new business at this stage.

 

What You Get

In recognition of your support, we will be offering you our bibs. You will be among the first groups of parents to try out our novel design bibs before they are available at the major retail stores. Hurry with your contribution now if you want to get the Christmas style prints on time for  the holidays. They would make great gifts for Christmas by the way. If you can't use our bibs, you can receive a gift certificate which you can gift to someone else later. Please refer to the various Perk Packages to see which one would best fit your preference. Alternatively, you can contribute any amounts you wish without receiving a perk.

International parents: please note that the success of this campaign will also mean that our products will be available for international sales through our Online Store. So...if you would like to try our product, please don't hesitate to help out our campaign even though you do not live in the U.S.

 

Our Current Print Selections

 

 

The Impact of Your Contributions

The main goal of this campaign is to raise funds for mass production of the bibs to bring to local major retail stores. At this time, we are happy to share a very encouraging piece of information with our backers, that is Babies"R"Us has expressed interest in our bibs and we are in the process of finding a way to partner together. Your support will definitely help in this partnership. To international parents: please note that the success of this campaign will also mean that our products will be available for international sales through our Online Store.

 

Risks & Challenges

At this time, our on-going challenge is finding more manufacturers, either domestically or internationally, that would be able to produce our bibs efficiently and economically. Currently we have a small network of domestic manufacturer partners and we are in the process of working with an international manufacturer in Asia. The major risks would be funding issues and production time required. Given a successful campaign and perseverance in our search, we believe we will be able to achieve our goal sooner or later.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

For those who may not be able to contribute financially to our campaign at this time, we would still value your help in getting our word out. Please share our story with your friends and acquaintances by using the Indiegogo Share Tools next to the Summary Video or by emailing your friends our campaign link https://igg.me/at/kahelelanidesignsbibs.

Thank you so much for your interest and your time!

story:
The B&B/Inn can have up to 11 bedrooms . It is on @ 6 acres across from the State Park in Saratoga Springs N.Y.

 It has great country views to have breakfast, lunch or dinner on  the deck and be 5-10 minutes from all the action in Saratoga year round. I have retired jockeys,present race jockeys and future jockeys and assistant trainers staying here in the summer already. I want to cater to the racing crowd and the jockeys will be here to meet and welcome you to the Saratoga Springs Jockey Club

I have a BS and MS in Communications  from Syracuse University. I traveled the country for years video taping sporting events and selling it back to the competitors. When the recession hit my customers disappeared then they bought handicams, phone cameras and Ipads and I was no longer needed. I am older now and can not travel and work like I did since I have had both hips replaced. 

The house is the last thing I have left and it can support itself with my new business model.

I stopped the foreclosure auction with minutes to spare and with this funding I can get a modification and create 10-15 jobs for people to run it. I did not know what to do until a friend mentioned Indiegogo.com  And here I am

I need funding for a engineer to lay out the project, a lawyer for the city planning board, a new roof, septic system, a handicapped bathroom and a commercial kitchen.

I will produce the video and text for the social media marketing 

Helping this project will send a message to the banks that there is more than one way to achieve your goals. They bought my mortgage from another TARP bank in a bundle and paid 10-20 cents on the dollar for it. They still want the full amount owed with interest! 

  •  

 We need @1.5 million to negotiate with the Bank and to do improvements to get code compliant with the city.

  I can make small bathrooms in just about every room. History tells us the house was one of the first Inns in Saratoga. We found a coin in the lawn from 1853.

Other improvements are to update some furniture, paint the walls and the house and deck.   

  • When you donate to the cause you will receive 20-40% discounts depending on the amount of your funding  towards any stay or meals during the off season in Saratoga and a 10% discount during the TRACK season of July, August and September 
  • If I don't reach my goal  I  can scale down the improvements until we start producing cash flow.

Your Funds will help David slay Goliath, help a family in need and create 10-15 Jobs

  • Your contributions will develop further a business that benefits me, my future employees and their families. We want you to come and be our guest year round knowing people make a difference not banks.
  •  I have great country views like Ocala and Lexington. Your contributions will help keep that view to enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner on the deck
  • I started my former video business in 1985 from nothing and with no bank help and in 15 years built it  to sales of over $ 1.2 million and created jobs for up to 30 people. In 2008 the income was $1.2 million in 2009  $170k. The recession created by the banks caused mine and thousands of business to fail. They got bailouts we did not.
  • I have a viable solution to my mortgage problem and need your help. You can come and stay and  enjoy the fruits of our collaboration..

The risk and challenges are the time to get it done by next summer and legal with the city planning board  

We need to apply for a liquor license and hire a general contractor to do the remolding.

Initial research shows I am zoned to be a B&B or Inn. I have done some of the code requirements like smoke detectors wired and battery, exit signs and have the cost for the other code requirements.

I have a experience engineer and lawyer standing by to carry the project forward

I can do all the marketing and radio,print and video advertising.

I have accounts for Air BnB, Home Away and Navy housing for the Saratoga Base

I will join the chamber of commerce and lodging bureau.

  • I am a hands on guy and remolded my former video office into 2 more bedrooms with a living room like a suite. I take care of the landscaping, fall leaf cleanup and snow removal. I do the cleaning and can cook too 
  •  

Other Ways You Can Help. If you can't donate come and stay with us anyway.

  • Spread the word.
  • Use Indiegogo share tools and help the cause 
  • Share us on your social media accounts
